articles.contentEn: Whereas,the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church (EOTC) is required to be organized in Spiritual council through the union of clergies and the faithful as per the pronouncement of proc- lamation No. 83/65, the first year, No. 1 Eccle- siastical Constitution (Qale Awadee) issued on Tikmit 15, 1965 E.C. (October 25, 1972); the revised Ecclesiastical Constitution (Qale Awadee) of the Spiritual council issued on Miazia19, 1970 E.C. (April 27, 1978); the revised bylaw of the Spiritual council issued on December 10, 1974 E.C.; the revised bylaw of the Spiritual council issued on Ginbot 9, 1977 E.C. (May 17, 1985); and the bylaw revised for the third time and iss ued in 1991 E.C (1998) as well as the directives passed at different times required to be amended and combined together in one fold;Whereas, the church is organized through the congregation of clergies and the faithful, and its being led by the Spiritual council administration is not a new trend, rather it is of early times on the basis of church history and holy scriptures, particularly the texts in Acts of the apostles; Whereas, being cognizant of its leadership and administration has been as per the law and practice deliberated and decided as well as passed through the council of apostles held at Jerusalem and considering that it has been led through the heads who have been spiritually nominated and elected by the congregation of clergies and followers general assembly (Acts of the Apostles, 6:1-6);Whereas, by recognizing that the assets and property of the church are solicited from the contribution of the faithful to be mobilized for accomplishment of apostolic missions and supporting the destitute (Acts of the Apostles, 4:32, 5:11, 1 Cor. 16:1-11);Whereas, by recognizing that disagreement, if happens with church  administration, should be seen and resolved through spiritual justice; Whereas, as provided in the Holy Scriptures (Leviticus 27:26-33, Deuteronomy 14:22, Num- bers 18:20-29, Malachi 3:7-12, Wisdom of Si- rach 7:31-32, 32:10-13, 1 Corinthians 16:1-5, Acts of the Apostles 4:32-36 to notify that it is the spiritual obligation of the clergies and the faithful that they pay the tithe for the temple of God and for its servants, the clergies, from every wealth and property they acquire;Whereas, as a whole, in order to ensure that the church operates being led and organized by its own law and system in terms of administration, spiritual justice, service and economic issues; Whereas, it is deemed essential to issue rules and regulations through the Holy Synod of the church that enable the Spiritual councils that are already established  and yet  to be established at different levels to be reinforced with their respective legal framework, as well as the powers and functions of the various departments be identified properly; With the help of the Most High God, Who is the owner of all of the laws, and as per its spiritual authority, the EOTC’s Holy Synod has issued the Qale Awadi (Ecclesiastical Constitution) presented as follows:
articles.contentAm: የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን በካህናትና በምዕመናን ኅብረት በሰበካ ጉባኤ እንድትደራጅ ታስቦ በትእዛዝ አዋጅ ቁጥር  3/5 ተፈቅዶ  ጥቅምት 15 ቀን 1965 ዓ.ም ታትሞ የወጣው አንደኛ  ዓመት ቁጥር 1 ቃለ ዐዋዲ፣ ሚያዝያ 19 ቀን 1970 ዓ.ም ተሻሽሎ የወጣው የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ማሻሻያ ቃለ ዐዋዲ፣ ታኅሣሥ 10 ቀን1974  ዓ.ም ታትሞ  የወጣው የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ማሻሻያ ደንብ፣ ግንቦት  9 ቀን 1977 ዓ.ም የወጣው የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ማሻሻያ ውስጠ ደንብ ፣በ1991 ዓ.ም ለሦስተኛ ጊዜ የተሻሻለው ቃለ ዐዋዲ እንዲሁም በየጊዜው የተላለፉት መመሪያዎች መሻሻልና በአንድነት እንዲጠቃለሉ ማድረግ አስፈላጊ ሆኖ በመገኘቱ፣ ቤተ ክርስቲያን በማኅበረ ካህናትና ምእመናን መደራጀቷ፣ በሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ አስተዳደር መመራቷ ከጥንት ያለ እንጂ አዲስ አለመሆኑን በቤተክርስቲያን ታሪክና በቅዱሳት መጻሕፍት የተጻፈውን በተለይም ግብረ ሐዋርያትን መሠረት በማድረግ፣ አመራሯና አስተዳደሯ በኢየሩሳሌም በተደረገው በሐዋርያት ጉባኤ ተመክሮና ተወስኖ በተላለፈው ሕግና ሥርዓት ይመራና በማኅበረ ካህናቱና ምእመኑን ጠቅላላ ጉባኤ በተመረጡ ቅዱስ መንፈስ ባልደረባቸው ኃላፊዎች ሥራ አስፈጻሚነት ይካሄድ እንደነበረ በመገንዘብ (የሐዋ ሥራ ምዕ.6*1-6) ሀብቷ ንብረቷ ከምእመናን በአስተዋፅኦ ተሰብስቦ ለአገልጋዮች መተዳደሪያ፣ ለሐዋርያዊ ሥራ ማስኬጃመና ለችግረኞች መርጃ እንዲውል መደረጉን በመረዳት (የሐዋ ሥራ ምዕ.4*'2 ምዕ. 5*%1፤1ኛ፣ ቆሮ ምዕ.%6*1-%1) በቤተ ክርስቲያን አስተዳደር ውስጥ አለመግባባት ቢፈጠር በፍትሕ መንፈሳዊ መታየትና መወሰን ያለበትን መሆኑን በመገንዘብ (1ኛ. ቆሮ ምዕ.6*1-*)በቅዱሳት መጻሕፍት ማለት (በኦሪት ዘሌ ምዕ. *7**6-'7 ዘዳ፤ ምዕ.%4**2፤ዘኁ ምዕ. %***-*9፤ ሚል ምዕ. 3*7-%2፤ መጽ. ሲራክ ምዕ.7*'1-'2፡ '2*%-%3፤1ኛ፤ በሐዋ ሥራ ምዕ.4*'2-'6) እንደተደነገገው ካህናትና ምእመናን ከሚያገኙት ከማንኛውም ሀብትና ንብረት ሁሉ ለእግዚአብሔር ቤተ መቅደስና ለአገልጋዮቿ ካህናት ቀዳምያቱን ዐሥራቱን በኩራቱን መክፈል ክርስቲያናዊ ግዴታቸው መሆኑን ለማሳወቅ፤ በጠቅላላው ቤተ ክርስቲያናችን በአስተዳደር፣ በፍትሕ መንፈሳዊ፣ በአገልግሎትና በምጣኔ ሀብት በኩል በራሷ ሕግና ሥርዓት በመመራትና በመደራጀት እንድትሠራ ለማድረግ፣ በየደረጃው ለተቋቋሙትና ለሚቋቋሙት የሰበካ መንፈሳዊያን ጉባኤያት  የየራሳቸውን ሕጋዊ አደረጃጀት ለማጠናከርና ድርጅቶችን በልዩ ልዩ የሥራ  ክፍሎች ለማሟላት፤ የሚገባቸውን ሥልጣንና ተግባር በቤተ ክርስቲያኒቱ ቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ሕግና ደንብ ማውጣት  አስፈላጊ ስለሆነ፤ የሕግጋት ሁሉ ባለቤት በሆነው በልዑል እግዚአብሔር አጋዥነት የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ በአለው መንፈሳዊ ሥልጣን መሠረት ከዚህ ቀጥሎ የተመለከተውን ቃለ ዐዋዲ አውጥቷል፡፡

articles.contentAm: ይህ ቃለ ዐዋዲ “የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያንን አንድነትና አስተዳደር ለማጠናከር በ፳፻፱ ዓ.ም. ለአራተኛ ጊዜ ተሻሽሎ የወጣ የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ “ቃለ ዐዋዲ” ተብሎ ሊጠቀስ ይችላል፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 2: Definitions
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፪: ትርጓሜ
articles.contentEn:
1. “Spiritual Councils” means:

A. The spiritual Assembly of the local church comprising clergies, the faithful, and the youth of the Sunday School, who can provide aids for the church with their knowledge, labor, and services, and who are also eligible to elect and be elected as members of the spiritual church administration council (Executive Committee) already established or yet to be established at the local church level.

B. The Woreda (sub-city) spiritual Council comprising clergies, the faithful, and the youth of Sunday School, who are representatives of each local church’s spiritual council, and who are eligible to elect and be elected as members of the Woreda spiritual administration council already established or yet to be established to expand and control the wealth and services of the locality.

C. The archbishop diocese spiritual Assembly comprising clergies, the faithful, and the youth of Sunday School, who are representatives of each Woreda spiritual administration council, and who are eligible to elect and be elected as members of the archbishop diocese spiritual administration council already established or yet to be established at the diocese level.

D. The Patriarchate General Spiritual Councils (the national general council of church) comprising clergies, the faithful, and the youth of Sunday School, who are representatives of each archbishop diocese spiritual administration council, and who are eligible to elect and be elected as members of the Patriarchate spiritual Administration Council (Executive Committee) already established or yet to be established.

2. “The spiritual church administrator” means:

1. Chief (teacher) of a monastery (The abbot)
2. The head of the church
3. The chief priest or head appointed for a rural church

3. “Manager” means:

A. Manager of Woreda diocese (district diocese)
B. Manager of the diocese

4. “General Manager” means General Manager of the Head Diocese
articles.contentAm:
1. ‘’የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ’’ ማለት:

ሀ) በአጥቢያ ለተቋቋመውና ለሚቋቋመው የቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ (የሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) የሚያስፈልጉትን አባላት ለመምረጥና ለአባልነትም ለመመረጥ የሚችሉ ቤተ ክርስቲያንን በዕውቀታቸው፣ በጉልበታቸው፣ በሀብታቸውና በአገልግሎታቸው የሚረዱ ካህናት፣ ምእመናንና የሰንበት ትምህርት ቤት ወጣቶች የሚገኙበት የአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ፣ ስብስብ ነው፡፡

ለ) በወረዳ ለተቋቋመውና ለሚቋቋመው የወረዳ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ የሚያስፈልጉትን አባላት ለመምረጥና ለመመረጥ የሚችሉና የአጥቢያውን ሀብትና አገልግሎት የሚያስፋፉና የሚቆጣጠሩ ከእያንዳንዱ የአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ የተወከሉ ካህናት፣ ምእመናን፣ የሰንበት ትምህርት ቤት ወጣቶች የሚገኙበት የወረዳው ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ነው፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 3: The Establishment of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church Spiritual assembley
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፫: የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ከርስቲያን የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ መቋቋም
articles.contentEn:
Spiritual Councils is established by the Qale Awadee (Ecclesiastical Constitution) from the patriarchate to the local church level under the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church Holy Synod.

This Qale Awadee (Ecclesiastical Constitution) hereby imposes an obligation for the establishment of spiritual Assembly at every place where the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church and Diocese offices exist.

Renown union monasteries are not obliged to establish a Spiritual council as they are administered by monastery administrative rules and regulations enacted by the  Holy Synod; exceptions may however be made depending on the area and the necessity thereof.spiritual Assembly established and to be established from local church and Woreda to the patriarchate level shall be accounted on behalf of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church as per articles 398 and 399 of the Ethiopian Civil Code.

City of the bishopric of each diocese shall be considered as one Woreda  and  shall  establish its own Spiritual council.
articles.contentAm:
፩. በኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ሥር ከመንበረ ፓትርያርክ እስከ አጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ድረስ የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ በቃለ ዐዋዲው መሠረት ተቋቁሟል፡፡

፪. የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ባለበት ቦታና እንደ ዚሁም የቤተ ክህነት ጽሕፈት ቤት በሚገኝበት ሁሉ የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ እንዲቋቋም ይህ ቃለ ዐዋዲ ያስገድዳል፡፡

፫. የታወቁ የአንድነት ገዳማት ቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ በሚያወጣው የገዳማት አስተዳደር ደንብና መመሪያ የሚተዳደሩ ስለሆነ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ እንዲያቋቁሙ አይገደዱም፡፡ ሆኖም እንደ አካባቢውና እንደ አስፈላጊነቱ እየታየ ሊያቋቁሙ ይችላሉ፡፡

፬. ከአንድ አጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ጀምሮ ከወረዳ እስከ መንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ድረስ በየደረጃው የተቋቋመውና የሚቋቋመው የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ በፍትሐ ብሔር ሕግ ቍጥር ፫፻፺፰ እና ፫፻፺፱ መሠረት ለኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን የተሰጣት ሕጋዊ መብትና ግዴታ በቤተ ክርስቲያን ይሠራበታል፡፡

፭. የሀገረ ስብከቱ መንበረ ጵጵስና ዋና ከተማ እንደ አንድ ወረዳ ስለሚቈጠር የራሱ የሆነ የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤን ያቋቁማል፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 4: Structure of the Spiritual Councils
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፬: የሰበካ መንፈሳውያን ጉባኤያት አደረጃጀት
articles.contentAm:
፩. የአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ካህናትና ምእመናን የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ፣

፪. የወረዳ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ፣

፫. የመንበረ ጵጵስና ሀገረ ስብከት ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ፣

፬. የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ፡፡
articles.contentEn:
1. Spiritual  Council of clergies and the faithful of the local church

2. Spiritual council of Woreda (district)

3. Spiritual council of the Archbishop diocese;

4. The Patriarchate General Spiritual Council

articles.titleEn: Article 5: Purpose of the Spiritual Council
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፭: የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ዐላማ
articles.contentAm:
የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ የሚከተሉት ዐላማዎች ይኖሩታል፡፡

፩. ቅድስት ቤተ ክርስቲያንን መጠበቅና አገልግሎቷም የተሟላ እንዲሆን ማድረግ፣

፪. የቤተ ክርስቲያንን አገልጋዮች በሐዋርያዊ ተግባር ማደራጀት፣ ችሎታቸ ውንና ኑሮአቸውን ማሻሻል፣

፫. ምእመናን በመንፈሳዊ ዕውቀት ጐልምሰው በምግባርና በሃይማኖት ጸንተው በክርስቲያናዊ ሕይወት እንዲኖሩ ማድረግ፣

፬. የቤተ ክርስቲያንን አስተዳደር ማጠናከርና በገቢ ራሷን ማስቻል፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 6: Activities of the Spiritual Council
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፮: የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ተግባር
articles.contentEn:
1. Spiritual Council of clergies and the faithful of the local church

2. Spiritual council of Woreda (district)

3. Spiritual council of the Archbishop diocese;

4. The Patriarchate General Spiritual Council.
articles.contentAm:
የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ዐላማውን ለመፈጸምና ለማስፈጸም የሚከተሉትን ተግባራት ያከናውናል፡፡

፩. የእግዚአብሔርን ወንጌለ መንግሥት መስበክና ትምህርቱንም ማስፋፋት፣

፪. የቤተ ክርስቲያንን መንፈሳዊ የአብነት እና ዘመናዊ ትምህርት ቤትን ማቋቋምና ማደራጀት፣

፫. መንፈሳዊና ማኅበራዊ አገልግሎትን ለምእመናን ሁሉ ማዳረስ፣

፬. የሰንበት ትምህርት ቤትን ማቋቋምና ማጠናከር፣

፭. ለቤተ ክርስቲያን አገልግሎት የሚያስፈልጉትን ሁሉ ማሟላት፣

፮. የቤተ ክርስቲያንን አስተዳደርና አገልግሎት በመንፈሳዊ ሕግና ሥነ ሥርዓት መምራት፣

፯. ቤተ ክርስቲያንን በሀብትና በንብረት ራሷን ማስቻል፣

፰. የቤተ ክርስቲያን ሀብትና ንብረት ቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ በሚያወጣው ሕግና ደንብ መሠረት እየተመዘገበ እንዲያዝ፣ እንዲጠበቅ፣ እንዲለማና እንዲያድግ ማድረግ፣

፱. ሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን በሚፈቅደው መሠረት ከበላይ የሚሰጡትን ሕግጋት፣ ደንቦች፣ መመሪያዎች፣ ትእዛዞችና ውሳኔዎችን መፈጸምና ማስፈጸም፣

፲. በቅርብም ሆነ በሩቅ የሚገኙ ሰበካ መንፈሳውያን ጉባኤያት እርስ በርሳ ተባብረውና ተረዳድተው እንዲሠሩ ማድረግ፣

፲፩. ልዩ ልዩ የምግባረ ሠናይ ድርጅቶችን ማቋቋምና አገልግሎታቸውን ማሟላት፣

፲፪. የሕንጻ ሥራ፣ እድሳት፣ ጥገናና የመሳሰሉት ሥራዎች ሁሉ ወቅቱን ጠብቀው የሚፈጸሙበትን ዕቅድና መርሐ ግብር ማዘጋጀት፤ በተግባር መዋላቸውን መቈጣጠር፣

፲፫. የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን እምነት ተከታዮችን ብዛት፣ የሰበካውን ንብረት፣ ገንዘብ፣ ገቢና ወጪ የመሳሰሉትን አኃዛዊ መረጃዎች ስታቲስቲክስ/ በወቅቱ እየመዘገቡ ለየሚመለከ ታቸው አካላት በሪፖርት እንዲገለጽ ማድረግ፣

፲፬. በዚህ ቃለ ዐዋዲ መሠረት ማንኛውንም ቤተ ክርስቲያንን የሚመለከት ጉዳይ መፈጸምና ማስፈጸም፣

፲፭. በዚህ አንቀጽ ከተራ ቍጥር ፩ እስከ ፲፬ የተዘረዘሩትን ተግባራት በቅድሚያ እያጠና ተገቢውን ማድረግና አስፈላጊም ሆኖ ሲገኝ ጉዳዩን ከሚመለከታቸው ግለሰቦችና ድርጅቶች ጋር እየተነጋገረ መፈጸምና ማስፈጸም፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 7: Formation and Structure of Local Church Spiritual Council
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፯: የአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ አመሠራረትና አወቃቀር

formation: A. As per this bylaw, clergies, the faithful and the youth of Sunday School of a certain local church shall jointly establish a Spiritual Council of the local church.
B. The Spiritual Council established in this manner shall hold a general congregation in the attendance of the local church’s clergies and the faithful twice a year accordingly.

C. The Spiritual Council shall elect an executive committee that shall meet twice a month to accomplish the tasks and responsibilities bestowed upon it, and thereby implement the objectives and functions of the Qale Awadee (Ecclesiastical Constitution).

D. No association of clergies, of the faithful, or of the youth of Sunday School can be established by the name of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church, unless it is recognized by the Spiritual Council of the local church, or unless it is permitted by the diocese, or by the Head diocese, or by the Holy Synod.
structure: A. One Spiritual Council presided over by the church administrator.
B. One Spiritual Administrative Council (executive committee) presided over by the church administrator.
C. Office of the local Spiritual Council.
D. Different work units of the locality.

formation: ሀ) በአንድ አጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን የሚገኙ ካህናት፣ ምእመናን፣ የሰንበት ትምህርት ቤት ወጣቶች በቃለ ዐዋዲው መሠረት በአንድነት በመደራጀት የአንድ አጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤን ይመሠረታሉ፡፡
ለ) በዚህ አኳኋን የተመሠረተው የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉበኤ እንደአስፈላጊነቱ ሁለት ጊዜ በዓመት የሚሰበሰብ የአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ ካህናትን ምእመናን በአንድነት የሚገኙበት መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ይኖረዋል፡፡
ሐ) የአጥቢያው መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ የቃለ ዐዋዲውን ዐላማና ተግባር ለመፈጸምና ለማስፈጸም እንዲችለው በወር ሁለት ጊዜ እየተሰበሰበ የተጣለበትን ሥራና ኃላፊነት የሚያከናውን የሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ ይመርጣል፡፡
መ) በአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ያልታወቀና ያልታቀፈ፣ በሀገረ ስብከቱ ወይም በጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት ወይም በቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ያልተፈቀደ ምንም ዓይነት የካህናት፣ የምእመናን፣ የሰንበት ትምህርት ቤት ወጣቶች ማኅበር በኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ስም መቋቋም አይችልም፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 8: Implementation of the Spiritual Council's Work
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፰: የአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ የሥራ አፈጻጸም
articles.contentEn:
1. Upon a call to the church clergies and the faithful by the Spiritual church administrator or concerned bodies, quorum of general congregation shall be constituted.

2. Abiding by the rules and regulations of church, the members of the Spiritual council, by chairmanship of the church administrator, shall ensure that all works are implemented; and on those matters that are to be settled by vote, they shall do accordingly.

3. Members entitled to vote:

A. Followers of the religion of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church;

B. And the faithful registered by the local parish council with ID cards; and those who have been in the locality at least for six months;

C. Those who have legal IDs as evidence that they are dwellers of the locality (area);

D. Those who fulfill their membership duties at the local church;

E. Clergies and the faithful of above 18 years, irrespective of genders (male and female).

4. An electoral committee, comprising clergies, the faithful, and the youth of Sunday School, and whose number is not less than five and not exceeding 15, shall be appointed to conduct the Spiritual election process. The electoral committee shall carry out the election on the very day. And the members of the committee shall fulfill the requirements stated in No. 3 of this article, they shall be known with their religious devotion and ethical conduct; and they shall also be literate.

5. As per article 11 No. 3 of the Qale Awadee (Ecclesiastical Constitution), one month ahead of the conduct of a new Spiritual council election, a standard report of the outgoing Spiritual council on accomplishments during its tenure, its planned activities as well as its overall works and financial performances shall be presented to the diocese, and then the plan and the report will be reviewed and presented to the locality.

6. The members of the executive committee mentioned in article 10 of the Qale Awadee (Bylaw) shall be appointed by the electoral committee from amongst the presented candidates.

A) Upon nomination by the administrative council (the executive committee), the Spiritual council shall elect heads for the work units of the Spiritual council, cited in chapter 4, article 15 of the Qale Awadee (Ecclesiastical Constitution).

B) With regard to permanent servants, the diocese, assessing the revenue and activities of the local church, shall decide in congregation and assign ordained priests upon recruitment on the basis of their religious devotion, ethical manner, knowledge, and experience.

C) In those low-income churches, the works shall be done by those members who are elected from amongst priests and the faithful.

8. Upon investigation and agreement on the annual budget assessed and presented by the administrative council, it shall present it in its standard to the office of archbishop diocese for permission.

9. It shall get the finance and asset of the local church as well as revenue and expenditure audited by the end of the budget year or at another time of need, either by the accountant of the diocese, or as needed and upon permission by the diocese, by an external auditor hired by the Head diocese as well as by the diocese.

10. It shall hear the financial, asset, and performance statement as well as audit report of the Spiritual church submitted by the administrative council; and if any doubtful matter, it shall decide with a majority vote.

11. The accountability of this council shall be to the woreda (district) Spiritual administrative council or to woreda (district) diocese office as per the hierarchy.

articles.titleEn: Article 9: Implementation of the Spiritual Council's Work
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፱: የአስራጭ ኮሚቴው ተግባርና የሥራ አፈጻጸም
contentEn: 1. The electoral committee shall get nominated candidates and carry out the election on the very day; and if not successful, it shall hold the election by the following Sunday.
2. The electoral committee shall assess the candidates running for membership of the executive committee and present the same to the local clergies and the faithful for election.
3. It shall also check the criteria of the voters as per Article 8 No. 3 of the Qale Awadee (Ecclesiastical Constitution).

4. The electoral committee shall give briefings to the voters before the commencement of the voting regarding the identity and qualification of the candidates so that they can make an informed choice.
5. The voting process, depending on the area, shall be either by writing, on card, or by raising hands and getting them counted.

6. The electoral committee shall have the responsibility that if its candidates aren’t supported by the local priests and the faithful, it shall bring other nominees, by the tip of the congregation, for the election.
7. Upon the completion of the voting, the electoral committee shall count the votes, sign the memo, and present the same to the church’s administrator.
8. The church’s administrator shall present the election minute submitted by the electoral committee to the Woreda (district) diocese for ratification and implementation.
contentAm: 1. አስመራጭ ኮሚቴው ዕጩዎችን በዕለቱ አስጠቁሞ ምርጫውን ያስፈጽማል፡፡ ሆኖም በዕለቱ ማስፈጸም ካልተቻለ በቀጣዩ እሑድ ምርጫውን ያከናውናል፡፡
2. ለሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ አባልነት የሚወዳደሩ ዕጩዎችን አጣርቶና የምርጫውን አፈጻጸም አዘጋጅቶ ለአጥቢያው ካህናትና ምእመናን ለምርጫ ያቀርባል፡፡
3. መራጮቹም በቃለ ዐዋዲው በአንቀጽ 8 ተራ ቁጥር 3 የተገለጸውን መስፈርት ማሟላታቸውን ያረጋግጣል፡፡
4. የምርጫው ድምፅ አሰጣጥ ከመጀመሩ አስቀድሞ አስመራጭ ኮሚቴው መራጮቹ የሚመርጧቸውን አባላት በትክክል እንዲያውቁና ብቁነታቸውንም አመዛዝነውና ተረድተው ለመምረጥ እንዲችሉ ለመራጮች ብቻ በተዘጋጀ ቦታ ትምህርትና ማብራሪያ እንዲሰጣቸው ያደርጋል፡፡
5. የምርጫው የድምፅ አሰጣጥም እንደ አካባቢውና እንደ አመችነቱ በጽሑፍ ወይም በካርድ ወይም እጅ በማውጣትና በማስቁጠር ሊሆን ይችላል፡፡
6. የአስመራጭ ኮሚቴው ካቀረባቸው ዕጩዎች መካከል በአጥቢያው ካህናትና ምእመናን ያልተደገፉ ቢኖሩ በጉባኤው ጠቋሚነት ሌሎች ዕጩዎች ቀርበው እንዲመረጡ የማድረግ ኃላፊነት አለበት፡፡
7. የድምፅ አሰጣጡ ሥነ ሥርዓት ከተፈጸመ እና አስመራጭ ኮሚቴው ወዲያውኑ ከመዘገበና ከተፈራረመበት በኋላ የጉባኤው ሰብሳቢ ለሆነው ለቤተ ክርስቲያኑ አስተዳዳሪ ያቀርባል፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 11: Amendment, Invalidation and Ratification of Election and Tenure of Elects
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፲፩:ምርጫን ማሻሻል፤ መሻርና ማጽደቅ ስለተመራጮች የአገልግሎት ዘመን
articles.contentEn:
1. Amendment, Invalidation, and Ratification of the Election:

A. All Spiritual council elections at the level of local church, upon the submission by the woreda (district) diocese, shall be approved by the archbishopric diocese. The archbishop may amend or invalidate the election if he finds its implementation incorrect.

B. If flaw of religion, embezzlement or other problem is encountered after the members of the Spiritual council have commenced works, the diocese may, upon assessment by the administrative council, cancel the decision.

2. The elected clergy or a faithful shall stay in duty for a term of three years; the member may be eligible for reelection; however, the member cannot serve for more than two consecutive terms.

3. The local church Spiritual council shall present its performance report before the end of its term and the conduct of the next election.

4. Election of new members shall be done one month before the end of the term of incumbent members; the newly elected members shall however commence work upon the full expiry of the term of the incumbent members.

5. Training shall be organized for newly elected members on the Qale Awadee (Ecclesiastical Constitution) and other church matters.

6. Replacement Members.

If the position of a member is vacant due to death or transfer or for the reasons cited under article 10 No 2 (A-C), or because the member is elected for the woreda (district) administrative council, the member who has obtained the second highest vote after the winning member of the previous election shall assume the position. And if there is no member for such replacement, the clergies and the faithful shall hold yet another election to fill the vacant space. The elected member shall serve till the expiry of the term.
articles.contentAm:
1.ምርጫውን ማሻሻል፣ መሻርና ማጽደቅ:

ሀ) በአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን የሚፈጸመው የሰበካ ጉባኤ ምርጫ ሁለበወረዳ ቤተ ክህነት አቅራቢነት በሀገረ ስብከቱ ሊቀ ጳጳስ ይጸድቃል፡፡ የምርጫው አፈጻጸም ትክክል ሆኖ ባያገኘው ሊቀ ጳጳሱ ምርጫውን በጉባኤ አይቶ ሊያሻሽለው ወይም ሊሽረው ይችላል፡፡

ለ) የሰበካ ጉባኤ አባላት ተመርጠው ሥራ ከጀመሩ በኋላ የሃይማኖት ሕጸድ፣ የገንዘብ ብክነት ወይም ሌላ ችግር ቢፈጠር ሀገረ ስብከቱ በአስተዳደር ጉባኤ ሁኔታውን አጥንቶ የመሻር ስልጣን አለው፡፡

2. ለአባልነት የተመረጠው ካህን ወይም ምእመን በተመረጠበት አገልግሎት ላይ የሚቆየው ለሦስት ዓመታት ይሆናል፡፡ ከሁለት ጊዜ በላይ በተከታታይ ሊመረጥ አይችልም፡፡

3. የአጥቢያው ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ የሥራ ዘመኑ ከማለቁና ቀጣዩ ምርጫ ከመካሄዱ በፊት የሥራ ክንውን ሪፖርት የማቅረብ ግዴታ አለበት፡፡

4. በሥራ ላይ ያሉት የሰበካ ጉበኤው አባላት የሥራ ዘመን ከማለቁ ከአንድ ወር በፊት የአዳዲስ አባለት ምርጫ ይፈጸማል፤ ነገር ግን አዳዲስ የተመረጡት አባላት ሥራቸውን የሚጀምሩት በሥራ ላይ ያሉት አባላት የሥራ ዘመን ሲያበቃ ነው፤

5. ለተመረጡት አባላት ቃለ ዐዋዲና የቤተ ክርስቲያን ሕግጋት በሚመለከታቸው አካላት ሥልጠና ይሰጣል፡፡

6. ስለ ተተኪ አባላት፣ አንድ አባል የሥራ ጊዜው ከማብቃቱ በፊት በሞት ወይም በዝውውር ምክንያት ወይም በአንቀጽ % ተራ ቁጥር 2 ከ (ሀ) እስከ (ሐ) የተዘረዘሩትን የማያሟላ መሆኑ ሲታወቅ ወይም ለወረዳው አስተዳደር ጉበኤ በመመረጡ ወይም በሌላ ምክንያት ቦታው ክፍት የሆነ እንደሆነ ባለፈው ምርጫ ከተመረጡት አባላት ቀጥሎ ከፍተኛ ድምፅ ያገኘው አባል ሆኖ ቦታውን ይተካል፡፡ በዚህ ዓይነት የሚተካ አባል ከታጣ እንደገና በካህናቱና ምእመናኑ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ድምፅ ብልጫ ተመርጦ የተባለውን ክፍት ቦታ በአባልነት እንዲተካ ያደርጋል፡፡ ተተኪውን አባል የሚያገለገልው የዘመኑ ምርጫ እስኪፈጸም ድረስ ይሆናል፡፡

articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፲፪: የአጥቢያው ሰበካ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አስተዳዳሪ ሥልጣንና ተግባር
articles.contentAm:
በቃለ ዐዋዲው በምዕራፍ 2 በአንቀጽ 5 እና 6 ዐላማና ተግባር እየፈጸመ በተጨማሪ የአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ (ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) የሚከተለውን ሥልጣንና ተግባር ይኖረዋል፡፡

1. የቤተ ክርስቲያን ሕግ በሚፈቅደው መሠረት የቤተ ክርስቲያንን እምነት፣ ሥርዓት እና ሲኖዶሳዊ መዋቅር የመጠበቅና የማስጠበቅ ግዴታ ይኖርበታል፡፡

2. ስለ ንዋየ ቅድሳት፣ ስለ ቅዱሳት መጻሕፍት፣ ስለ ልዩ ልዩ ታሪካዊ ቅርሶች አጠባበቅ፣ አያያዝ እያጠና ይመክራል፤ ይጠብቃል፤ ያስጠብቃል፡፡
articles.titleEn: Article 12፡ Powers and Functions of the Local Church spritual Administrative Council (Executive Committee)
articles.contentEn:
The local church’s Spiritual Council (Executive Committee), in addition to its tasks vested by virtue of Chapter Two, Articles 5 and 6 of the Qale Awadi (Ecclesiastical Constitution), shall have the following powers and functions:

1. It shall be obligated to ensure that the beliefs and orders of the church, as well as the structure of the Synod, are maintained.

2. It shall study and consult on the preservation of ecclesiastical objects, Holy Scriptures, and other heritages, ensuring that they are well maintained.

3. It shall establish a special congregation of clergy to oversee matters related to faith and the mysteries of the church in the local Spiritual context.

4. Through the appointed congregation of clergy, it shall preside over matters related to accusations arising among couples married in church, as well as matters related to priesthood. If the matter exceeds the mandate of this congregation, it shall, as per the hierarchy, present it to the higher body.

5. It shall protect the youth of Sunday School from all forms of evil, ensuring that all teachings and songs align with the dogma, canon, and tradition of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church. It shall have the responsibility to follow up and supervise their actions and conduct to ensure they adhere to Christian teachings. It shall also help those young people who are not registered in Sunday School to be enrolled and become firm in faith and deed.

6.1. A. It shall receive contributions and report them to the pertinent unit. B. It shall sue and be sued on behalf of the local church.

6.2. In accordance with the Qale Awadi (Ecclesiastical Constitution), by submitting its plan and study to the diocese and upon approval, on behalf of the local Spiritual Church, it: A) Shall sign contractual agreements. B) Shall engage in litigation. C) Within its operational scope, it may lease or rent both fixed and non-fixed assets. D) It may obtain a bank loan when necessary, but only for feasible development works, subject to the consensus of the Diocese Administrative Council under the chairmanship of the Archbishop and with written permission from the Archbishop.

7. Without prejudice to the above-mentioned, when necessary, for entering agreements related to fixed assets or matters of high estimation, the administrative council, under the chairmanship of the Archbishop and with written approval, may sign contractual agreements.

8. As per the rules and regulations enacted by the Holy Synod, it shall determine details related to the asset and resource management of the local church.

9. It shall notify the amount of money contributed by priests and the faithful to the Spiritual, and ensure its submission as per Article 56/1 of this Qale Awadi.

10. It shall ensure timely submission to the diocese, as per Article 57/1 of this Qale Awadi, 20% of the Spiritual Church’s total income for the general administration of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church, education, evangelization, development, charity, and joint plans and activities by different spiritual entities.

11. It shall ensure submission, with permission at the central level, of 20% of the income obtained during the construction of new church buildings, schools, clinics, etc., except for charity donations from individuals, organizations, and donors.

12. It shall allocate a budget for teachers and students of church schools at the local Spiritual Church to expand and strengthen the schools.

13. It shall deposit, in the name of the Spiritual Church, all revenues in a bank account opened with the permission of the diocese Archbishop.

14. A) Without prejudice to Article 57 of this Qale Awadi, it shall examine and present the annual budget of the church to the office of the Archbishopric diocese. B) It shall implement the budget upon receiving approval after examination and agreement by the office of the Archbishopric diocese.

15. It shall establish the church’s Spiritual Council office and its work units.

16. It shall review and make decisions based on the performance statements submitted by the church office and the audit report of the Spiritual supervisor.

17. When necessary, for constructing a building at the local Spiritual Church, it shall establish a construction committee for the planned project, upon receiving permission and direction from the diocese. The members of this committee shall be elected by the congregation of priests and the faithful of the local church.

18. It shall open a separate bank account in the name of the church for the construction project, upon permission from the diocese, as per Article 13 of this article.

19. When money is withdrawn from the bank: A. If it is for regular Spiritual Council expenses, it shall be withdrawn upon the joint signatures of the church’s administrator and the Deputy Chairperson of the Spiritual Council. B. If it is for construction expenses, it shall be withdrawn via a cheque signed jointly by the administrator and the chairperson of the construction committee or, in the absence of the chairperson, the deputy shall sign.

20. It shall examine, amend, annul, and approve decisions passed by the different units of the local church on various matters.

21. It shall examine the faults committed by servants of the Spiritual Church, identify administrative issues, and pass verdict accordingly. Issues related to crime shall be dealt with in accordance with the law.

22. It shall elect and send one priest, one faithful, and one young Sunday School student from the members of the administrative council to the Woreda’s general parish council.

23. In accordance with Article 7/1 (B) of this Qale Awadi, and upon permission from the diocese, it shall present a report on its performance and financial expenses to the congregation of priests and the faithful at the meeting held every six months and one month before the expiry of the tenure of the Spiritual Administrative Council.

24. It shall oversee and prevent unnecessary activities that go against the canon of the church during major holidays and celebrations.

25. It shall supervise and prohibit activities involving loudspeakers and noises, except for those with permission, such as cassette vending and other items on the church premises and its environs.

26. It shall oversee and prohibit activities carried out on the premises of the church, whether in halls or other shelters, during Mahlet (church service), liturgy, gospel teaching, and other spiritual services.

27. The Spiritual Administrative Council of the local church shall be accountable to the office of the Woreda (district) diocese.

articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፲፫: የአጥቢያ ሰበካ መንፈሣዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ ም/ሰብሳቢ ሥልጣንና ተግባር
articles.contentAm:
በቃለ ዐዋዲው በአንቀጽ 5 እና 6 የተመለከተውን ዐላማና ተግባር ለመፈጸም እና ለማስፈጸም አስተዳዳሪው የሚከተለው ሥልጣንና ተግባር ይኖረዋል፡፡

1. የቤተ ክርስቲያኑ አስተዳዳሪ የሰበካው ቤተ ክርስቲያን ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ በመሆን በዚህ ቃለ ዐዋዲና ይህን ቃለ ዐዋዲ ተከትሎ በሚወጣው የውስጥ ደንብ መሠረት ስለ ሰበካው ካህናትና ምእመናን መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤና ስለ አስተዳደሩ ጉባኤ የሥራ አፈጻጸም በአጥቢያ ሰበካ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ላለው መንፈሳዊ አገልግሎትና አስተዳደር ኃላፊና ተጠሪ ነው፡፡

2. ስለ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አገልጋዮች መንፈሳዊ አገልግሎትና አስተዳደር ከቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ በወጣውና በሚወጣው ደንብ መሠረት የአጥቢያውን ሰበካ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አስተዳደርና መንፈሳዊ አገልግሎት ይመራል፡፡ 

3. የአጥቢያው ሰበካ ጉባኤ ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ ምርጫ ከመከናወኑ በፊት ለአጥቢያው ቤተ ክርስቲያን ጠቅላላ ካህናትና ምእመናን የግንዛቤ ትምህርት ይሰጣል፤ እንዲሰጥም ያደርጋል፡፡

4. በአጥቢያው ሰበካ ውስጥ በቃለ ዐዋዲው ምዕራፍ 4 አንቀጽ %6 ተራ ቁጥር 1 የተዘረዘሩትን ንኡሳን ክፍሎች እንዲደራጁና በትክክል ሥራ ላይ እንዲውሉ ተገቢውን ከትትልና ቁጥጥር ያደርጋል፡፡ የልዩ ልዩ ክፍል ሥራ ኃላፊዎች ያስተባብራል፤ ይቆጣጠራል፡፡

5. የአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያኑ አገልጋዮች ካህናትና ምእመናን የአባልነት መታወቂያ ያላቸው መሆናቸውንና በአጥቢያው ሰበካ ውስጥ ያሉት ምእመናን ሁሉ መመዝገባቸውን፤ የጥምቀት፣ የጋብቻ እና የሙታን መዛግብት እየተሠራባቸው መሆኑን ያረጋግጣል፡፡

6. የአጥቢያው ሰበካ ምእመናንና የምእመናኑንም ልጆች ከኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ሃይማኖትና ምግባር እንዳይወጡ ያስተምራል፤ ይጠብቃል፤ ያስጠብቃል፤ በጠቅላላው ካህናትና ይልቁንም የንስሓ አባቶችን በማስማሩና በጥበቃው ተግባር እንዲጠናከሩ መመሪያ ይሰጣል፤ ይቆጣጠራል፡፡

7. የቤተ ክርስቲያኑ ገቢ በትክክል እንዲሰበሰብ ገንዘቡና ማንኛውም የሚንቀሳቀስና የማይንቀሳቀስ ሀብትና ንብረት እንዲጠበቅና በአስተዳደር በኩል በመንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር እንዲሰጣል፡፡
articles.titleEn: Article 13: Powers and Functions of the Executive Committee of the Spiritual Administration
articles.contentEn:
In order to implement the objective and function mentioned in Articles 5 and 6 of this Ecclesiastical Constitution (Qale Awadee), the administrator shall have the following powers and functions.

1. Being a chief executive of the Spiritual, the church administrator, as per this Ecclesiastical Constitution (Qale Awadee) and as per bylaws enacted following this Ecclesiastical Constitution, shall be accountable for the parish clergies and the faithful as well as for spiritual services and administration of the local church.

2. Shall lead the administration and spiritual services of the local Spiritual church as per the rules and regulations enacted by the Holy Synod for the church workers' spiritual services and administration.

3. Shall conduct and facilitate orientation for the whole clergies and the faithful of the local church before the election of the executive committee of the local Spiritual council.

4. Shall closely follow and supervise the organization and proper implementation of the work units mentioned in chapter 4, article 16, number 1 of this Ecclesiastical Constitution (Qale Awadee).

5. Shall supervise and check that workers of the local church and the faithful have identification cards; and that all the faithful are registered at the local Spiritual; and that documents of baptism, matrimony, and the deceased are used properly.

6. Shall teach and keep the faithful of the local church and their children with the teachings of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church; furthermore, shall give order to soul fathers to teach and keep their soul children.

7. Shall closely follow that revenues of the church are collected properly; and that every fixed and non-fixed assets of the church are well maintained, and that they are properly utilized.

8. As per the budget allocation from superior, approve implementation of every expenditure.

9. Pursuant to article 12 sub-articles 7-9, upon the acceptance from the Spiritual administrative council as well as upon approval and permission by letter of the diocese Spiritual administrative council, the administrator, jointly with the deputy chairperson, shall enter and sign agreement.

10. Shall call meeting of the Spiritual administrative council; shall act according to the decisions and supervise the implementation.

11. Shall submit to the woreda (district) diocese for approval of the election of members of the local Spiritual administrative council and heads of the different work units.

12. On behalf of the local Spiritual administrative council, the administrator shall present bi-annual report on matters pertaining to the Spiritual clergies and the faithful; the church workers; finance and property, as well as about performances of the different work units, to congregation of the Spiritual clergies and the faithful; and shall refer the decision to the woreda (district) diocese.

13. Shall not take unilateral decision, without discussion and consensus of the Spiritual executive committee, and without the consent of superior body, on issues related to salary increment, promotion, transfer, and firing of workers.

14. Shall supervise performances of workers, based on report submitted by different pertinent heads; shall advise; shall reprove wrong doers; and shall issue oral and written warning.

15. Shall implement all the assigned functions in line with the decision made as per the Ecclesiastical Constitution.

articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፲፬ : የአጥቢያው ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ ም/ሰብሳቢ ሥልጣንና ተግባር
articles.contentAm:
1. የቤተ ክርስቲያኑ አስተዳዳሪ በሌለ ጊዜ ም/ሰብሳቢው የአስተዳዳሪውን ተግባር ይፈጽማል፡፡

2. የተፈቀደውን መደበኛ የሰበካ ጉባኤ ወጪ ሒሳብ ከአስተዳዳሪው ጋር በጣምራ ፊርማ ያንቀሳቅሳል፡፡

3. ም/ሰብሳቢው ሥልጣነ ክህነት የሌለውን ከሆነ ምሥጢራተ ቤተ ክርስቲያንን የሚመለከቱ ጉዳዮችን ማየት አይችልም፡፡

4. ም/ሰብሳቢው ተጠሪነቱ ለቤተ ክርስቲያኑ አስተዳዳሪ ነው፡፡
articles.titleEn: Article 14: Power and Function of Deputy Chairperson of the Local Church Spiritual Administrative Council
articles.contentEn:
1. The deputy shall act in place of the church administrator in his absence.

2. The deputy shall, by joint signatures with the administrator, release the approved regular expenses of the Spiritual.

3. The deputy shall not deal with matters related to church mysteries if he is not ordained to the priesthood.

4. The deputy shall be accountable to the church administrator.

articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፲፭: ስለ ገዳማት አስተዳደርና ሥርዓተ ምንኵስና

details: ሀ) የአንድነት ገዳማት የሚተዳደሩበት እንደየገደማቱ ሥርዓት በየአህጉረ ስብከቱ እየተጠና የሚፈቀድ ደንብና መመሪያ ይኖራቸዋል፡፡ እንደ አስፈላጊነቱ በሀገረ ስብከቱ አቅራቢነት በቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ሊወጣላቸው ይችላል፡፡
ለ) ሥርዓተ ገዳም በሚፈቅደው መሠረት በየገዳማቱ ውስጥ ጽ/ቤቶችና ልዩ ልዩ የአመራር አካላት ይቋቋማሉ፡፡
ሐ) በገዳሙ አስተዳደር መሰረት የጾም የጸሎት ሥርዓት እንደተጠበቀ ሆኖ መነኮሳት የሚማሩበት ቦታና በልዩ ልዩ አገልግሎት የሚሠማሩበት የሥራ መስኮች ይኖሩታል፡፡
መ) መነኮሳይያትም በተወሰነላቸው የገዳም ክልል ጸንተው በሥርዓተ ምንኩስና መሠረት ራሳቸውንና ሌሎችንም እየረዱ እንዲኖሩፈና እንዲሠሩ ይደረጋል፡፡
ሠ) ገዳማት የየራሳቸው የተከበረ የቦታ ክልል ይኖራቸዋል፡፡
ረ) በቃለ ዐዋዲው አንቀጽ 3 ተራ ቁጥር 3 የተደነገገው እንደተጠበቀ ሆኖ በአንድነት ገዳማት ዙሪያ የሚኖሩ ምእመናን በሰበካ ጉባኤ ቢደራጁም ባይደራጁም በዓይነት ወይም በጥሬ ገንዘብ እንዲከፍሉ ይደረጋል፡፡
ሰ) ማንኛውም የገዳማቱ ገቢ በጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት የበላይ ተቆጣጣሪነት እና በሀገረ ስብከቱ ጽ/ቤት ኃላፊነት በሚታተሙ ካርኒዎች ብቻ ገንዘቡን በሞዴል ' እና *4 ንብረቱን በሞዴል %9 እንዲሰበሰብ ያደርጋል፡፡
ሀ) የገዳም አበ ምኔት ወይም እመ ምኔት በማኅበረ መነኮሳትና መነከሳይያት የሚገለገለውን የአንድት ገዳም ከቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ በሚሰጠው መመሪያና ደንብ መሠረት ያስተዳድራል፡፡
ለ) ከገዳሙ ውስጥ በግብረ ገብነታቸው፣ በትምህርታቸውና በጸሎታቸው ትሩፋት ይሠራሉ ተብለው የሚታመንባቸው መነኮሳት ተመርጠው ሲቀርቡ በሊቀ ምርፋቅነት፣ በሊቀ አርድአትነት በዕጓል መጋቢነት እየሠየመ እንዲሠሩ ያደርጋል፡፡
ሀ) ሥርዓተ ምንኩስናን የሚቀበሉ ምእመናንና ምእመናት

articles.titleEn: Article 16: Establishment of the Office and Work Units of the Local Church Spiritual Council Appointment and Service Term of Heads
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፲፮ : የአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ጽ/ቤትና የሥራ ክፍሎች መቋቋም
articles.contentEn:
The local Spiritual administrative council (executive committee) shall have one office and the following work units to accomplish its objectives and duties as cited under articles 5 and 6 of this Qale Awadi (Bylaw), and shall establish, as per the law of church article 21, the different work units listed below:

A. Evangelical Service Unit

B. Spiritual Education Unit

C. Clerical Service Unit

D. Sunday School Unit

E. Planning and Development Unit

F. Charitable Activities Unit

G. Legal Affairs UnitQale Awade

H. Ecclesiastical Objects, Property and Heritage Unit

I. Accounting Unit

J. Finance Unit

K. Supervision unit

L. Construction, Renovation and Maintenance Unit

M. Statistics Unit

N. Spiritual Council Coordination Unit

O. Monasteries Unit

2. Without prejudice to the type and nature of works at the units mentioned in this Article, Number 1 from (A) to (O), the same work leader may be assigned for two or more similar work units at a time; and committees may also be formed as needed.

3. The Spiritual Council office shall have one secretary and permanent heads of work units.

4. For rural churches, clergies and the faithful with renowned ethics, skills and experience shall be assigned as secretary and head of unit, upon election at clergies congregation Qale Awade in the presence of the head of the woreda diocese and under chairmanship of the church administrator.

5. For urban monasteries and churches, they shall be assigned by the office of the diocese according to their training and skills.

6. Workers to be assigned to cashier and treasurer positions shall have the obligation to present a guarantor with adequate guarantee.

7. In circumstances and times when assignment for the work units mentioned under this article, number 1 from (A) to (O) of this Qale Awadee is not possible, the administrative council shall nominate candidates known for their good conduct, skills and experience, and they shall be assigned upon approval by the woreda (district) diocese.

8. The service term for volunteers other than the regular paid workers shall be determined as per article 11 number 2 of this Qale Awadee pertaining to the Spiritual administrative council (executive committee); the appointment of the heads of the work units shall be made after the election of the Spiritual administrative council (executive committee) members.
articles.contentAm:
የሥራ ኃላፊዎች ምርጫና የአገልግሎት ዘመን

1. የአጥቢያ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ (ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) በቃለ ዐዋዲ አንቀጽ 5 እና 6 የተገለጸውን ዐላማና ተግባር ለመፈጸም እንዲችል አንድ ጽ/ቤትና በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ )1 ተራ ቁጥር 4 የተደነገገውንና ከዚህ በታች የተዘረዘሩትን ልዩ ልዩ የሥራ ክፍሎች ያቋቁማል፡፡

ሀ) የስብከተ ወንጌል ክፍል

ለ) የመንፈሳዊ ትምህርት ክፍል

ሐ) የካህናት አገልግሎት ክፍል

መ) የሰንበት ት/ቤት ክፍል

ሠ) የዕቅድና ልማት ክፍል

ረ) የምግባረ ሠናይ (በጎ አድራጎት ክፍል)

ሰ) የሕግ ክፍል

ሸ) የንዋየ ቅድሳት፣ የንብረትና የቅርሳ ቅርስ ክፍል

ቀ) የሒሳብ ክፍል

በ) የገንዘብ ቤት

ተ) የቁጥጥር ክፍል

ቸ) የሕንጻ ሥራ፣ እድሳትና ጥገና ክፍል

ኀ) አኃዛዊ መረጃ /ስታስቲክስ/ ክፍል

ነ) የሰበካ ጉባኤ ማስተባበሪያn

ኘ) የገዳማት ክፍል

2. በዚህ አንቀጽ በተራ ቁጥር 1 ከ(ሀ) እስከ (ኘ) የተዘረዘሩት የሥራ ክፍሎች የሥራ ዓይነትና ጠባይ እንደ ተጠበቀ ሆኖ ተመሳሳይ የሆነውንና የማይቃረነውን ክፍል ሁለት ሦስቱን አንድነት በማደራረብ በአንዳንድ የሥራ ኃላፊዎች ማሠራት ይቻላል፡፡ እንደ ሁኔታውም እየታየ ኮሚቴ ለሚያስፈልጋቸው የሥራ ክፍሎች ኮሚቴ ማቋቋም ይቻላል፡፡

3. በአጥቢያው ሰበካ ጉባኤ ጽ/ቤት አንድ ጸሐፊና በቋሚነት የሚመደቡ የየክፍል ኃላፊዎች ይኖራሉ፡፡

4. በገጠር አብያተ ክርስቲያናት ለዋና ጸሓፊነትም ሆነ ለክፍል ኃላፊነት በግብረ ገብነታቸው፣ በችሎታቸውና በሥራ ልምዳቸው የተመሰከረላቸው ካህናት እና ምእመናን የወረዳው ቤተ ክህነት ኀላፊ በተገኘበትን የቤተ ክርስቲያኑ አስተዳዳሪ እና በምእመናን ምሁራን እንዲሁም የአምባሳሊን ስምንት በምስኪና በመሀከል ማስተር ይወረዳል፡፡
