articles.titleEn: Article 42: Powers and Functions of the Archbishopric Diocese Spiritual Administrative Council (Executive Committee)
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፵፪: የመንበረ ጵጵስና ሀገረ ስብከት ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ (ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) ሥልጣንና ተግባር
articles.contentEn:
The Archbishopric Diocese General Spiritual Administrative Council (Executive Committee), in addition to executing the objectives and functions mentioned under Articles 5 and 6 of this bylaw, shall have the following powers and functions:

1. Shall ensure the implementation of the laws enacted by the Holy Synod, the decisions passed by the Patriarchate General Spiritual Council, and the directives given by the Archbishopric General Diocese Spiritual Council.

2. Shall formulate plans for the growth of spiritual and secular education, gospel preaching, development, charity, and the overall prosperity and services of the diocese; shall review the plans from every Woreda and submit them for approval, after which it shall ensure their implementation.

3. Shall follow up on the implementation of the plans approved by the decision of the General Spiritual Council.

4. Shall monitor and ascertain that the funds allotted for the plans are duly utilized.

5. Shall ensure that the 20% contribution from each of the local churches and from every income of the diocese is paid according to the shares mentioned below:

a. To the Patriarchate General Spiritual Council………………… 35%

b. To the diocese……………………………… 30%

c. To the Woreda diocese offices within the Archbishopric diocese………………… 30%

d. For the expansion of model schools within the diocese……………… 5%

6. Shall ensure that the Addis Ababa diocese pays 20% of the contribution collected from local churches and from any of its revenue as follows:

a. To the Patriarchate General Spiritual Council… 65%

b. To the diocese………………………………… 35%

7. Shall, in collaboration with relevant organizations and experts, carry out charitable and development activities, thereby expanding the development and social services of the diocese.

8. Shall assess the annual budget allocation presented from the local churches and present it to the office of the Archbishopric diocese with recommendations; and shall pass it back to the requesting unit upon approval by the Diocese Spiritual Administrative Council.

9. Shall ensure that all financial contributions are collected in due time and managed properly.

10. Shall follow up on the administration, property, and financial management of the diocese; shall also ensure that the finance and property are duly inspected by a supervisor.

11. Shall consistently follow up that the Spiritual Councils at different levels within the diocese duly present their respective complete reports that reveal their human resources, performances, future plans, properties, and financial incomes and expenses.

12. Shall prepare and present agendas and work plans for the assembly of the council.

13. Shall notify the presidency of the General Council (the Archbishop) for the Spiritual Administrative Council (Executive Committee) assembly to be convened.

14. Shall, other than the diocese manager or a representative, elect and send, from the churches and monasteries under the diocese, one priest, one faithful, and one young person among members of the local Spiritual Administrative Council (Executive Committee), and heads of the Evangelical Service and Spiritual Council of the diocese, totaling five persons, to attend meetings of the Patriarchate General Spiritual Council.

15. Shall act as per the provision of Article 11 Number 4 of this bylaw to replace members of the Archbishopric Diocese General Spiritual Administrative Council (Executive Committee) missing as a result of their election to the Patriarchate General Spiritual Administrative Council whenever the number of the Archbishopric Spiritual Administrative Council members falls below five.

16. The term of service for elected members of the Archbishopric Spiritual Administrative Council shall be as per Chapter 3 Article 11 Number 2 of this bylaw.

17. The Diocese Spiritual Administrative Council (Executive Committee) shall be accountable to the Archbishopric Diocese General Spiritual Council.
articles.contentAm:
1. በቃለ ዐዋዲው በአንቀጽ 5 እና 6 የተገለጸውን ዐላማና ተግባር እየፈጸመና በትክክል መፈጸሙን እየተቆጣጠረ የመንበረ ጵጵስና ሀገረ ስብከት መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ የሚከተለው ሥልጣንና ተግባር ይኖረዋል፡፡

2. በቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ የወጣውን ሕግ፣ ደንብና መመሪያ በመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ የሚታላለፈውን ውሳኔና በመንበረ ጵጵስና ጠቅላላ የሀገረ ስብከት መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ የሚሰጠውን መመሪያ በሥራ ላይ እንዲውል ያደርጋል፡፡

3. ስለ መንፈሳዊ ዘመናዊ ትምህርት፣ ስለ ስብከተ ወንጌል፣ ስለ ልማትና በጎ አድራጎት በጠቅላላ የሀገረ ስብከቱን ሀብትና አገልግሎት ለማስፋፋት ዕቅድ እያወጣና ከየወረዳው የተላኩን የሥራ ዕቅዶች እያጠና ከአስተያየት ጋር ለጠቅላላ ጉባኤው አቅርቦ ሲፈቅድ በሥራ ላይ እንዲውል ያደርጋል፡፡

4. በሀገረ ስብከቱ ጠቅላላ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ውሳኔ መሠረት የተፈቀዱትን ዕቅዶች አፈጻጸም ይከታተላል፡፡

5. ለዕቅዶች የተፈቀደውን ገንዘብ በደንቡ መሠረት ወጭ ሆኖ ለታቀደለት ሥራ መዋሉን ይቆጣጠራል፡፡

6. ከየአጥቢያው አብያተ ክርስቲያናት ከተሰበሰበው 20% እና ከማናቸውም የሀገረ ስብከቱ ገቢ ላይ ከዚህ በታች በተዘረዘረው መሠረት ለእያንዳንዱ እንደ ድርሻው እንዲከፈል ያደርጋል፡፤

ሀ) ለመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ………………...35%

ለ) ለሀገረ ስብከቱ ………………………………………………………………………30%

ሐ) በሀገረ ስብከቱ  ለሚገኙት የወረዳ ቤተ ክህነት ጽ/ቤቶች ……………….  30 %

መ) በሀገረ ስብከቱ ለሚገኙ የአብነት ትምህርት ቤቶች ማስፋፊያ ……......5%

7. የአዲስ አበባ ሀገረ ስብከት ከየአጥቢያው አብያተ ክርስቲያናት ከሰበሰበው 20% እና ከማናቸውም የሀገረ ስብከቱ ገቢ ላይ፡-

ሀ/ ለመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ……… 65%

ለ/ ለሀገረ ስብከቱ …………………………………… 35%

8. የሀገረ ስብከቱን የልማትና ማኅበራዊ አገልግሎት ለማስፋፋት አግባብ ካላቸው ድርጅቶችና ባለሙያዎች ጋር በመተባበር የበጎ አድራጎት ልዩ ልዩ የልማት ስራዎችን ያከናውናል፡፡

9. ከየአጥቢያው አብያተ ክርስቲያናት ተዘጋጅቶ የሚቀርበው ዓመታዊ የገንዘብ ድልድል (በጀት) አጥንቶ ከአስተያየት ጋር ለመንበረ ጵጵስናው ሀገረ ስብከት ጽ/ቤት ያቅርባል፡፡ በሀገረ ስብከቱ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ ሲፈቀድም በሥራ ላይ እንዲውል ለጠየቀው ክፍል ያስተላልፋል፡፡

10. ማንኛውም የገንዘብ ክፍያ በወቅቱ መሰብሰቡን፣ በደንቡ መሠረት በትክክል መያዙንና መጠበቁን ያረጋግጣል፡፡

11. የሰበካው አስተዳደር፣ የገንዘብ አያያዝና የንብረት አጠባበቅ ይከታተላል፤ በየጊዜውም ገንዘቡንም ሆነ ንብረቱን በሒሳብ ተቆጣጣሪ ያስመረምራል፡፡

12. በሀገረ ስብከቱ በየደረጃው የሚገኙት የሰበካ መንፈሳውያን ጉባኤያት ሁሉ የሰው ኀይላቸውን፣ የሥራ ክንውናቸውን፣ የወደፊት ዕቅዳቸውን፣ የንብረት ይዞታቸውን፣ የገንዘብ ገቢያቸውንና ወጪያቸውን በመግለጽ ሪፖርታቸውን አሟልተው በወቅቱ እንዲያቀርቡ በየጊዜው ክትትል ያደርጋል፡፡

13. ለጠቅላላ ጉባኤ ስብሰባ የመነጋገሪያ አርእስት እና የሥራ መርሐ ግብር በቅድሚያ አዘጋጅቶ ያቀርባል፡፡

14. የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ (ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) እንደ አስፈላጊነቱ ጠቅላላ ጉባኤው እንዲጠራ ለጠቅላላ ጉባኤው ርእሰ መንበር (ሊቀ ጳጳስ) ያሳስባል፡፡

15. ከአጥቢያው ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ (ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) አባላት መካከል በመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ስብሰባ የሚገኙ ከሀገረ ስብከቱ ሥራ አስኪያጅ ሌላ በሀገረ ስብከቱ ሥር ካሉ አድባራትና ገዳማት የሚመረጡ አንድ ካህን፣ አንድ ምእመን፣ አንድ የሰንበት ት/ቤት ወጣት፣ የሀገረ ስብከቱ የስብከተ ወንጌልና የሰበካ ጉባኤ ክፍል ኃላፊዎች በድምሩ አምስት ሰዎችን መርጦ ይልካል፡፡

16. ከመንበረ ጵጵስናው  ሀገረ ስብከት ጠቅላላ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ አባላት የአገልግሎት ዘመን በቃለ ዐዋዲው በምዕራፍ 3 በአንቀጽ 11 ቁጥር 2 በተገለጸው መሠረት ይሆናል፡፡

17. የሀገረ ስብከት መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ (ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) ተጠሪነቱ ለመንበረ ጵጵስናው ሀገረ ስብከት ጠቅላላ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ይሆናል፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 43: The Archbishopric Diocese Office
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፵፫: የመንበረ ጵጵስና ሀገረ ስብከት ጽ/ቤት
articles.contentEn:
Pursuant to Article 51 Number 6 of the law of church, the bishopric diocese office is accountable to the patriarchate head office.

1. The archbishopric diocese office is a higher administrative body for the monasteries, churches, rural churches and Spiritual councils at different levels within the diocese area

2. As per Article 51 Number 2 of church law,each diocese office shall be headed by an archbishop, or by a bishop, or by episcopes

3. The diocese office shall have one administrative council and different units mentioned under Article 51 Number 4 of church law and Article 16 Number 1 of this bylaw, to execute the provisions cited under Article 52 of the church law and objectives and functions of this bylaw and different decisions, regulations, and directives given by the superior

4.The Addis Ababa diocese shall be administered by the provisions of this bylaw and the rules and directives of the Holy Synod..

በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ )1 ተራ ቁጥር 6 በተደነገገው መሠረት የመንበረ ጵጵስና ሀገረ ስብከት ጽ/ቤት ተጠሪነቱ ለመንበረ ፓትርያርክ ጠቅላይ ጽ/ቤት ይሆናል፡፡

1.በሀገረ ስብከቱ ክልል ውስጥ ለሚገኙት ገዳማት፣ አድባራትና የገጠር አብያተ ክርስቲያናት፣ በየደረጃው ለተቋቋሚት ሰበካ መንፈሳዊያን ጉባኤትና ለወረዳ ቤተ ክህነት የሥራ አመራር ከፍተኛ የአስተዳደር ኀላፊነት ያለው መሥሪያ ቤት ነው፡፡

2.በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ )1 ተራ ቁጥር 2 ድንጋጌ መሠረት እያንዳንዱ ሀገረ ስብከት ጽ/ቤት በሊቀ ጳጳስ ወይም በጳጳስ ወይም በኤጲስ ቆጶስ ይመራል፡፡

3.የሀገረ ስብከቱ ጽ/ቤት በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ )2የተደነገገውንና የቃለ ዐዋዲውን ዐላማና ተግባር ከበላይ የሚተላለፈውን ሕግ፣ ደንብና መመሪያ የሚፈጽምበትና የሚያስፈጽምበት አንድ አስተዳደር ጉባኤና በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ )1 ተራ ቁጥር 4 የተደነገገውንና በቃለ ዐዋዲው አንቀጽ %6 ተራ ቁጥር 1 የተዘረዘሩት ልዩ ልዩ የሥራ ክፍሎች ይኖሩታል፡፡ የሥራ ዝርዝራቸውም እንደ የአህጉረ ስብከቱ ሁኔታ እየታየ ከአንቀጽ %6 እስከ አንቀጽ ' ድረስ የተገለጸው ይሆናል፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 44: Powers and Functions of the Diocese Archbishop
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፵፬: የሀገረ ስብከቱ ሊቃ ጳጳስና ሥልጣንና ተግባር
articles.contentEn:
In addition to the provisions mentioned under Article 37 and 53 of church law, the Archbishop shall have the following powers and functions:

1. The archbishop is accountable to the Holy Synod. He is the superior authority of the archbishop diocese office and the general diocese administration; he is also the chairperson of the general Spiritual Council.

2. As the spiritual father of the general church in the diocese, he shall consistently provide spiritual advice and blessings to heads of the Spiritual Councils; provide education and console clergies, the faithful, and Sunday school children and youth.

3. Shall remain vigilant to ensure that the earliest and historic order of our sole, apostolic Holy Church is maintained well; and that its followers are defended from invading doctrines.

4. Provide priesthood and deaconship titles, upon oral and written exams conducted by the head of education, head priest, and other clergies assigned by the diocese, to those qualified church servers as per Articles 6 and 7 of the spiritual rule (Fetih Menfesawi) and Article 20 Numbers 8 and 9 of this bylaw; he shall issue certificates to those granted the titles.

5. Shall not grant ordination titles to those who have no credentials from their respective churches and to those without adequate church education.

6. Shall facilitate the establishment of different work units needed in the diocese and also assign heads to the units, upon due assessment by the diocesan administrative council; and shall notify the Head Diocese about its implementation.

7. Shall authorize, based on the canon of the church, the establishment of new churches in the diocese; shall place a cornerstone and bless the house for sacraments.

8. Shall give directives to administrators and other workers of churches and monasteries within the diocese; shall provide correction during irregularities; and shall pass judgment against serious misconduct, upon examination by the diocesan administrative council.

9. Shall, along with members of the diocesan administrative council, look into legal issues of the first instance and appeals within the diocese; shall refer to the Head Diocese or to the Holy Synod, cases for which appeal is made.

10. Shall, along with the diocese manager, authorize the bank account of the diocese as per the provision under Article 53 Number 9 of church law.

11. The archbishop is the chairperson of the diocesan administrative council.
articles.contentAm:
በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ 37 እና 53 የተደነገገው በተጨማሪ ሥልጣንና ተግባር ይኖሩታል፡፡

1. ሊቀ ጳጳሱ ተጠሪነቱ ለቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ነው፡፡ የሀገረ ስብከቱ ጽ/ቤትና ጠቅላላ የቤተ ክህነት አስተዳደር መሪ እና የበላይ ኀላፊ የጠቅላላው ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ርእሰ መንበር ነው፡፡

2. በሀገረ ስብከቱ ለምትገኘው ለጠቅላላዋ ቤተ ክርስቲያን መንፈሳዊ አባት በመሆኑ ለሰበካ ጉባኤያት መሪዎች መንፈሳዊ ምክር፣ መመሪያና ቡራኬ ይሰጣል፤ ያበረታታል፡፡ ለካህናት፣ ለምእመናን ለሰንበት ት/ቤት ሕፃናትና ወጣቶች ትምህርት ይሰጣል፤ ያጽናናል፡፡

3. አንዲት ቅድስት ከሁሉ በላይና ሐዋርያዊት የሆነችው ቤተ ክርስቲያን ጥንታዊነቷና ታሪካዊነቷ በሰላም ተጠብቆ እንዲኖር እና ተከታዮቿ በባዕድ ሃይማኖት አስፋፊዎች እንዳይሰርቁ ብርቱ ጥንቃቄ ያደርጋል፡፡

4. በፍትሕ መንፈሳዊ አንቀጽ 6 እና 7፣ በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ 3 ተራ ቁጥር 4 በተደነገገው መሠረት የቤተ ክርስቲያን አገልጋየች በትምህርት ክፉሉ በአቡነ ቀሲሱና ሀገረ ስብከቱ በሚመድባቸው ሌሎች ካህናት አማካይነት በቃልና በጽሑፍ ፈተና እየተጣራ ፈተናውን ላለፉት ብቻ የዲቁና የቅስና ማዕረግ ይሰጣል፡፡ ማዕረጉን ለተቀበሉት ምስክር ወረቀት እንዲሰጣቸው ያደርጋል፡፡

5. ከሚያገለግሉበት አጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን መሸኛ ደብዳቤ ላልያዙና በቂ የቤተ ክርስቲያን ትምህርት ለሌላቸው ክህነት አይሰጥም፡፡

6. በሀገረ ስብከቱ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ እያስጠና፣ እያወሰነና እያስወሰነ ለሀገረ ስብከቱ የሚያስፈልጉትን ልዩ ልዩ የሥራ ክፍሎች እንዲቋቋሙና ኀላፊዎችም እንዲመደቡ ያደርጋል፡፡ አፈጻጸሙንም ለጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት ያሳውቃል፡፡

7. በሀገረ ስብከቱ ክልል ውስጥ አዳዲስ ለሚተከሉት አብያተ ክረስቲያናት በቀኖና ቤተ ክርስቲያን መሠረት ፈቃድ ይሰጣል፣ የመሠረት ድንጋይ ያኖራል፣ ቅዳሴ ቤቱን ይባርካል፤ ያከብራል፡፡

8. በሀገረ ስብከቱ ሥር ለሚገኙ አድባራትና ገዳማት አስተዳዳሪዎችና ልዩ ልዩ ሠራተኞች መመሪያ ያስተላልፋል፡፡ ጥፋት ሲፈጸምም የማስተካካያ እርማት ይሰጣል፡፡ ከባድ ጥፋቶችንም በሀገረ ስብከቱ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ እያየ ይወስናል፡፡

9. በሀገረ ስብከቱ ክልል ውስጥ በመጀመሪያ ደረጃም ሆነ በይግባኝ የሚቀርበውን የሕግ ሥነ ሥርዓት ጉዳይ ከሀገረ ስብከቱ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ አባላት ጋር ያያል፡፡ ይግባኝ የሚጠየቅበትንም ጉዳይ ለጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት ወይም ለቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ እንዲተላለፍ ያደርጋል፡፡

10. በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ 3 ተራ ቁጥር 9 ላይ በተደነገገው መሠረት የሀገረ ስብከቱን የባንክ ሒሳብ ከሀገረ ስብከቱ ሥራ አስኪያጅ ጋር ያንቀሳቅሳል፡፡

11. ሊቀ ጳጳሱ የሀገረ ስብከቱ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ ሰብሰቢ ነው፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 45: Powers and Functions of the Diocese Manager
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፵፭ : የየሀገረ ስብከቱ ሥራ አሥኪያጅ ሥልጣንና ተግባር
articles.contentEn:
1.The manager shall be chief executive of the archbishopric diocese office and the diocese,and the chairperson of the diocese Spiritual administrative council.

2. The manager shall be in charge of the archbishopric diocese (diocese) administrative council in the absence of the archbishop.

3. Shall ensure that the directives of the Holy Synod, and the decisions of the Patriarchate general Spiritual council, and of the archbishop general Spiritual council are timely delivered to offices of Woreda diocese, churches and the Spiritual councils at different levels; and shall follow up the implementation of the same

4. Shall supervise the due collection and submission of the payment contributions from all local churches as per Article 42 Number 5 of this bylaw

5. Shall supervise that all expenses are made in accordance with the diocese budget limit and that the accounting and property management is implemented as per Articles 25 to 27 of this bylaw

6. Shall, under supervision by the patriarchate head office and upon authorization by the archbishopric diocese office, print and distrbiute income and expense invoices, modules and other prints needed for the use of local Spiritual councils; and shall follow up the timely delivery of the same

7. The manager shall not hire, promote, transfer or make salary increment, and firing workers, without the authorization of the archbishop, and approval of the archdiocese administrative council Shall give orders and provide guidance to administrators and others workers of churches and monasteries under the archdiocese

8. Shall ensure the registry, in addition to the data presented to him from Woreda dioceses,of clergies, teachers, preachers and the faithful with their families in various educationnal and work institutions; and shall submit, indue time, the statistical data of the archdiocese, its annual performance and financial report to the archbishopric diocese Spiritual administrative council

9. Shall, jointly with the archbishop of the diocese, authorize bank account of the archdiocese

10.The archdiocese manager shall be accountable to the diocese archbishop
articles.contentAm:
1.ሥራ አስኪያጁ የሀገረ ስብከቱ  ጽ/ቤትና የቤተ ክህነቱ ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚና በሀገረ ስብከት ደረጃ የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ ሰብሳቢ ነው፡፡

2.ሊቀ ጳጳሱ በሌለበት ጊዜ ሥራ አስኪያጁ የሀገረ ስብከቱን (የቤተ ክህነቱን) አስተዳደር ጉባኤ በሰብሳቢነት ይመራል፡፡

3.ከቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ የሚወጣው መመሪያ ከመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤና በሀገረ ስብከት ደረጃ የጠቅላላው ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ውሳኔዎች ለወረዳ ቤተ ክህነት ጽ/ቤቶችና ለአብያተ ክርስቲያናት እንዲሁም በየደረጃው ለሚገኙት ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤያት በወቅቱ እንዲደርሱ ያደርጋል፤ አፈጻጸሙንም ይከታተላል፡፡

4.በየጊዜው ከየአጥቢያው ቤተ ክርስቲያን የሚከፈለውን ገንዘብ ተቆጣጥሮ በወቅቱ ገቢ እንዲሆንና በአንቀጽ (2 ተራ ቁጥር 5 በተደነገገው መሠረት እንዲፈጸም ያደርጋል፡፡

5.ማንኛውም ወጪ ለሀገረ ስብከቱ በተፈቀደው በጀት መሠረት መሆኑን፤ የሒሳብ አያያዝና የንብረት አጠባበቁ በቃለ ዐዋዲው አንቀጽ *5 እስከ *7 በተደነገገው መሠረት መፈጸሙን ይቆጣጠራል፡፡

6.ለአጥቢያው ሰበካ  መንፈሳውያን ጉባኤያት አገልግሎት  የሚውሉትን የገቢና የወጪ ካርኒዎች፣ ሞዴሎችንና አስፈላጊ የሆኑ ሌሎች እትሞችን በመንበር ፓትርያርኩ ጠቅላይ ጽ/ቤት የበላይ ተቆጣጣሪነትና በመንበረ ጵጵስና ሀገረ ስብከት ጽ/ቤት ኀላፊነት  አሳትሞ በወረዳው አማካይነት ለአጥቢያ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊን ጉባኤያት ያከፋፍላል፡፡ በትክክል መድረሱንም ይከታተላል፡፡

7.ሥራ አስኪያጁ ከሊቀ ጳጳሱ መመሪያ ሳይቀበልና በሀገረ ስብከቱ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ ሳይወሰን ሠራተኛ መቅጠር፣ እድገት መስጠት፣ ዝውውር ማድረግ፣ ደመወዝ መጨመር፣ ከሥራ ማሰናበትና የመሳሰሉትን ሁሉ መፈጸም አይችልም፡፡

8.በሀገረ ስብከቱ ሥር ለሚገኙ አድባራትና ገዳማት አስተዳዳሪዎችና ልዩ ልዩ ሠራተኞች የሥራ መመሪያ ያስተላልፋል፤ ይመክራል፡፡ ጥፋት ሲፈጸምም ከሊቀ ጳጳሱ መመሪያ እየተቀበለ እንደየጥፋቱ መጠን የቃልና የጽሑፍ ማስጠንቀቂያ ይሰጣል፡፡

9.ከየወረዳው ቤተ ክህነት ተመዝግቦ ከቀረበለት መረጃ በተጨማሪ በልዩ ልዩ የትምህርት፣ የሥራ ተቋማት እና በመሳሰሉት ድርጅቶች ሁሉ የሚገኙትን ካህናት፣ መምህራን፣ ሰባክያን እና ምእመናንን ከነቤተሰቦቻቸው እንዲመዘገቡ በማድረግ  የሀገረ ስብከቱን አኃዛዊ  መረጃዎች /ስታስቲክስ/ የበጀት ዓመቱን የሥራ ክንውን እና የፋይናንስ ሪፖርት ለመንበረ ጵጵስናው ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ በወቅቱ ያቀርባል፡፡

10.የሀገረ ስብከቱን የባንክ ሒሳብ ከሀገረ ስብከቱ ሊቀ ጳጳስ ጋር ያንቀሳቅሳል፡፡

11.በቃለ ዐዋዲው አንቀጽ (4 ተራ ቁጥር % በተደነገገው መሠረት የሀገረ ስብከቱ ሥራ አስኪያጅ ተጠሪነቱ ለሀገረ ስብከቱ ሊቀ ጳጳስ ነው፡፡

articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፵፮: የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ አመሠራረትና አደረጃጀት
articles.contentAm:
1. አመሠራረት፡-

ሀ) በመላው የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ውስጥ የእያንዳንዱ ሀገረ ስብከት ሥራ አስኪያጆች፣ ከየመንበረ ጵጵስናው ሰበካ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ ተመርጠው የተወከሉ የካህናት፣ የምእመናንና የሰንበት ት/ቤት ወጣቶች በመንበረ ፓትርያርኩ ውስጥ ከቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ አባላት፣ ከጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት የመምሪያና የድርጅት ኀላፊዎች በአንድነት ተሰብስበው የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤን ይመሠረታሉ፡፡

ለ) በዚህ አኳኋን የተመሠረተው የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ በዓመት አንድ ጊዜ የሚሰበሰብ አንድ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ይኖረዋል፡፡ ይህም የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አጠቃላይ ስብሰባ ይሆናል፡፡

ሐ) ይኸው የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ስልጣኑንና ተግባሩን የሚያስፈጽምለት እንደየአስፈላጊነቱ የሚሰበሰብ የአስተዳደር ጉባኤ ወይም የሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ ይመርጣል፡፡

2. አደረጃጀት፡-

ሀ) ፓትርያርኩ ርእሰ መንበር የሆነብ አንድ የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ (የቤተ ክርስቲያን አጠቃላይ ስብሰባ)፤

ለ) የጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት ጠቅላይ ሥራ አስኪያጅ ሰብሳቢ የሆነበት አንድ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ (ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) እና የጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት አስተዳደር ጉባኤ፤

ሐ) የአጠቃላይ ሰበካ አስተዳደር ጽ/ቤት (የጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት ጽ/ቤት)፣

መ) የአጠቃላይ ሰበካ አስተዳደር የሥራ ክፍሎች የጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት መምሪያዎችና ልዩ ልዩ የሥራ ክፍሎች ናቸው፡፡

4. የጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት ም/ሥራ አስኪያጅ ……………………………… የጉባኤው አባልና ጸሐፊ

5. የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ (ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) ……………………… ……… የጉባኤው አባላት

6. የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ ጠቅላይ ጽ/ቤት የመምሪያው፣ የኮሚሽንና የድርጅት ኀላፊዎች …………………………….. የጉባኤው አባላት

7. የመንበረ ጵጵስና ሀገረ ስብከት ሥራ አስኪያጆች ………………………… የጉባኤው አባላት፣

8. ከመንበረ ጵጵስና ሀገረ ስብከቱ መንፈሳዊያን የአስተዳደር ጉባኤያት ተመርጠው የተወከሉ ካህናት …………………… የጉባኤው አባላት

9. ከየመንበሩ ጵጵስና ሀገረ ስብከት መንፈሳውያን የአስተዳደር ጉባኤያት ተመርጠው የተወከሉ ምእመናን ………………………… የጉባኤው አባላት

10. ከየመንበረ ጵጵስና ሀገረ ስብከት ሰበካ መንፈሳውያን አስተዳደር ጉባኤያት ተመርጠው የተወከሉ የሰንበት ት/ቤት ወጣቶች …………………. የጉባኤው አባላት

12. በውጭ ሀገር የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ተወካዮች ……………………… የጉባኤው አባላት፣

articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፵፰: የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ሥልጣንና ተግባር
articles.contentEn:
The patriarchate general Spiritual administrative council, in addition to executing the objectives and functions cited under Articles 5 and 6 of this bylaw, shall have the following powers and functions:

1. Upon hearing the statements and future plans of Spiritual councils, it shall discuss every agenda in due detail and give recommendation to the Holy Synod accordingly.

2. Shall examine big issues of archdiocese administration presented through by the general Spiritual administrative council (executive committee)

3. Shall provide proposals that church model schools, higher spiritual schools, training institutions for clergies, gospel preachers, teachers of Sunday School as well as development and charity organizations are established and organized towards the strengthening of spiritual and social services of the church

4. Shall elect a minimum of four and maximum of eight members of the general Spiritual administrative council (executive committee) as mentioned in Article 49 of this bylaw

5. The term of service for elect members shall be as per the provision under Chapter 3 Article 11 Number 2 of this bylaw.

6. The patriarchate general Spiritual council shall be accountable to the Holy Synod
articles.contentAm:
በቃለ ዐዋዲው አንቀጽ 5 እና 6 የተዘረዘሩትን ዐላማና ተግባር እየፈጸመና እያስፈጸመ የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ቀጥሎ የተመለከተው ሥልጣንና ተግባር ይኖረዋል፡፡

1.የየአህጉረ ስብከቱን መግለጫዎች እንዲሁም የወደፊት እቅዶች ከሰማ በኋላ በቅድሚያ በተዘጋጀው የመነጋገሪያ ርእስ (አጀንዳ) መሠረት አንድ በአንድ በጉዳዩ ላይ ተወያይቶ የውሳኔ ሀሳብ ለቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ያቀርባል፡፡

2.በአጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ (ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) በኩል ተጣርተው የሚቀርቡትን የየሀገረ ስብከት ከፍተኛ የሰበካ አስተዳደር ጉዳዮችን እየመረመረ አስፈላጊውንና ተገቢውን ይፈጽማል፡፡

3.የቤተ ክርስቲያንን መንፈሳዊና ማኅበራዊ አገልግሎት ለማጠናከር የአብነት ት/ቤቶች ከፍተኛ የመንፈሳዊ ት/ቤቶች፣ የካህናት፣ የሰባክያንና የሰንበት ት/ቤት መምህራን ማሠልጠኛዎች፣ የልማትና በጎ አድራጎት ተቋማት፣ በሀገረ ስብከቱና በማእከል ደረጃ እንዲቋቋሙና እንዲደራጁ የውሳኔ ሀሳብ ያቀርባል፡፡

4.በቃለ ዐዋዲው በአንቀጽ (9 የተዘረዘሩትን ከአራት ያላነሱ ከስምንት ያልበለጡ የአጠቃላዩን አስተዳደር ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ (ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) አባላት ይመርጣል፡፡

5.የተመረጡት አባላት የአገልግሎ ዘመን በቃለ ዐዋዲው በምዕራፍ 3 በአንቀጽ  %1 በተራ ቁጥር 2 በተገለጸው መሠረት ይሆናል፡፡

6.የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ተጠሪነቱ ለቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ነው፡:

articles.titleEn: Article 50:Powers and Functions of the Patriarchate General Spiritual Administrative Council(Executive Committee)
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፶: የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ(ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) አባላት
articles.contentEn:
1. General manager of the head diocese……chair person of the council

2. Deputy manager of the head diocese………first deputy chairperson of the council

3. Amongst representatives of the clergies and the faithful cited under numbers 4 and 5 of this Article, an eligible clergy or eligible faithful aged between 30 and 60 elected by this council……………….Second Deputy Chairperson;

4. A minimum of two and maximum four representative clergies elected by the general Spiritual council…………….members of the council

5. A minimum of two and maximum four faithful with one young representative elected as representatives by the general council……….members of the council

6. Chief of the head diocese office Spiritual council department …….member of the council

7. Secretary general of the head diocese office Spiritual council department ……….secretary of the council
articles.contentAm:
1.በቃለ ዐዋዲው በአንቀጽ 5 እና 6 የተዘረዘሩትን የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ  ዐላማና ተግባር  እየፈጸመና በሥራ መተርጐምን እየተቆጣጠረ በተጨማሪ የሚከተለውን ሥልጣንና ተግባር ይኖረዋል፡፡

1.በቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ የሚወጣውን ደንብ፣ መመሪያና በመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ የሚተላለፈውን ውሳኔና መግለጫ ለየአህጉረ ስብከቱና ለሚመለከታቸው ሁሉ በወቅቱ እንዲደርሳቸው ያደርጋል፡፡

2.በሀገረ አቀፍ ደረጃ ለሚሠሩት ከፍተኛ ዕቅዶችና ለልዩ ልዩ መንፈሳዊና ማኅበራዊ አገልግሎት የተወሰነውን ገንዘብ በደንቡ መሠረት በትክክል መያዙንና መጠበቁን ይከታተላል፡፡

3.ከየአጥቢያው አብያተ ክርስቲያናት ለኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ጠቅላላ አስተዳደርና ለልዩ ልዩ አገልግሎት የሚከፈለውን ገንዘብ ተቆጣጥሮ በየጊዜው ገቢ መሆኑን ያረጋግጣል፡፡

4.የአጠቃላዩ ሰበካ አስተዳደር ገንዘብ አያያዝና የንብረት አጠባበቅ በቃለ ዐዋዲው ከአንቀጽ *5 እስከ*7 በተደነገገው መሠረት ማከናወኑን ይከታተላል በሒሳብ አጣሪም ያስመረምራል፡፡

5.የሰበካ  መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ የመተዳደሪያ ደንብና የሥራ መመሪያ እንደዚሁም ሊሻሻል የሚገባውን የሰበካ  መንፈሳውያን ጉባኤያት ሕግጋትና ልዩ ልዩ ድንጋጌዎች እያጠና ለአጠቃላዩ ጉባኤ ያቀርባል፡፡

6.በሀገር አቀፍ ደረጃ ለሚከናወኑት የቤት ክርስቲያን  ዓይነተኛ ተግባራት ማለት ለስብከተ ወንጌል፣ ለመንፈሳዊ ትምህርት፣ ለልማት፣ ለበጎ አድራጎት፣ ለሰበካ መንፈሳውያን ጉባኤያት ሀብትና አገልግሎት መስፋፋት ዕቅድ እያወጣና መርሐ ግብር እያዘጋጀ  ለአጠቃላዩ ጉባኤ አቅርቦ ሲፈቀድለት በሥራ ላይ እንዲውል ያደርጋል፡፡

7.ለመንበረ  ፓትርያርክ  አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ስብሰባ አጠቃላይ ሪፖርት፣ የመነጋገሪያ አርእስት (አጀንዳ) እና መርሐ ግብር ያዘጋጃል፡፡

8.የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ ወይም ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ ተጠሪነቱ ለመንበረ ፓትርያርኩ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ይሆናል፡፡

9.በየዓመቱ ጥቅምት ወር የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ እንዲካሄድ ያደርጋል፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 51:Office of the Patriarchate Head Diocese As per Article 1 of church law
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፶፩: የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ ጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት ጽ/ቤት በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ 1 መሰረት፡-
articles.contentEn:
The office of the patriarchate head diocese is the central administration and head of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo churches both at home and overseas, archbishopric dioceses, monasteries, as well as of the Spiritual councils established at different levels worldwide; it is the top management and highest authority over diocese and spiritual services of the church

2. The laws and regulations of the Holy Synod,decisions and directives of the permanent Synod as well as all the provisions of this by law shall be implemented through the office and the departments and other units within it

3. Shall have one administrative council that receives and presides over issues pertaining to administration and spiritual justice from every diocese
articles.contentAm:
1.በሀገር ውስጥና በውጭ ሀገር ለሚገኙት የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን መንበረ ጵጵስና አህጉረ ስብከት፣ ለገዳማትና አድባራት እንዲሁም በየደረጃው ለተቋቋሙት ሰበካ መንፈሳውያን ጉባኤያት ሁሉ የአስተዳደር ማእከልና ርእሰ፣ ለቤተ ክህነት ሥራ አመራርና ለመንፈሳዊ አገልግሎት ሁሉ የበላይ ኀላፊና ባለሙሉ ሥልጣን መሥሪያ ቤት ነው፡፡

2.የቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ሕግና ደንብ፣ የቋሚ ሲኖዶስ ውሳኔና መመሪያ እንዲሁም የቃለ ዐዋዲው ድንጋጌ ሁሉ ተግባራዊ የሚሆን በጽ/ቤቱና በሥሩ በሚገኙት መምሪያዎችና ልዩ ልዩ የሥራ ክፍሎች አማካይነት ነው፡፡

3.ከየአህጉረ ስብከቱ የሚቀርቡትን የአስተዳደርና የፍትሕ መንፈሳዊ ጉዳዮችን እየተቀበለ የሚወስን የአስተዳደር ጉባኤ አለው፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 52:Powers and Functions of the Patriarch
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፶፪: የፓትርያርኩ ሥልጣንና ተግባር
articles.contentEn:
In addition to the provisions mentioned under Article 32 of the church law, the patriarch shall have the following powers and functions:

1. His holiness the patriarch, head of the archbishops of EOTC, archbishop of Axum, and Echegie (the See) of St. Tekle Haimanot is a spiritual father and the highest patron of the EOTC all over the world; whereas he is fully authorized for the unity and administration of the church, he shall preside over the Holy Synod and the patriarchate general Spiritual council

2. Whereas the patriarch is a spiritual father for all, he shall give directives, spiritual education, and benediction to heads of Spiritual councils at different levels; clergies, and the faithful

3. Shall ensure that cases submitted at the level of first instance and/or appeals are seen and decided by the head diocese, or by the permanent Synod, or by the Holy Synod council

4. Shall have the right and responsibility to call emergency meeting for all members of the Holy Synod (archbishops), and if necessary, for the patriarch general Spiritual council, at time of urgent situations that defy the faith of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church, and other important issues of the church

5. Shall endeavor to further expand and strengthen the long-standing spiritual and social relationship among sister oriental Orthodox churches
articles.contentAm:
ጠቅላይ ሥራ አስኪያጁ  በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ 32 ንኡስ ቁጥር 7 እና አንቀጽ (4 የተደነገገውና  የሚከተሉት ሥልጣንና ተግባር ይኖሩታል፡፡

1.ጠቅላይ ሥራ አስኪያጁ ተጠሪነቱ ለቅዱስ ሲኖዶስና ለቅዱስ ፓትርያርክ ሆኖ ለመላዋ የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን የሥራ አመራር የገንዘብና ንብረት አስተዳደር የበላይ ኃላፊ በጠቅላላው የቤተ ክህነት ዋና ባለሥልጣን ነው፡፡

2.ጠቅላይ ሥራ አስኪያጁ የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤን በም/ሰብሳቢነት፤ የጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት አስተዳደር ጉባኤን በዋና ሰብሳቢን ይመራል፡፡

3.የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ  የቆመለትን ዐላማና ተግባር ለመፈጸምና ልዩ ልዩ የክፍል ሥራዎችንም ለማሟላት ለጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት መምሪያዎችና ድርጅቶች የሥራ መምሪያ ይሰጣል፤ እያንዳንዱ የሥራ ዘርፍ ኀላፊም የተመደበበትን የሥራ ድርሻ በትክክል እያከናወነ መሆኑን ይከታተላል ይቆጣጠራል፡፡

4.በመጀመሪያ ደረጃም ሆነ በይግባኝ የሚቀርቡትን ጉዳዮችን በመንበረ ፓትርያርክ ጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት አስተዳደር ጉባኤ እንዲታዩና እንዲወሰኑ ያደርጋል፡፡ ከዚህ ጉባኤ ሥልጣን በላይ የሆነውን ጉዳይ ለቋሚ ሲኖዶስ ወይም ለቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ያቀርባል፡፡

5.በየጊዜው ከየሰበካው ቤተ ክርስቲያን ለጠቅላላው አገልግሎት ጉዳይ ተብሎ የሚከፈለው ገንዘብ ተጠቃሎ መሰብሰቡንና በትክክለኛው ቦታ በወቅቱ ገቢ መሆኑን ይከታተላል፡፡

6.ማንኛውም ዓይነት ወጪ በሚደረግበት ጊዜ ለመንበረ ፓትርያርኩ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ በተፈቀደው በጀት መሠረት መሆኑንና የሒሳቡ አያያዝ የንብረቱ አጠባበቅ በቃለ ዐዋዲ አንቀጽ *5፣ *7፣ እና *6 በተዘረዘረው መሠረት መፈጸሙን ይቆጣጠራል፡፡

7.በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ (4 ቁጥር % በተደነገገው መሠረት በበጀት የተመደበውን ማንኛውንም የቤተ ክርስቲያኒቱን ገንዘብና ንብረት ከቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ዋና ጸሐፊ ጋር በጣምራ ፊርማ ያንቀሳቅሳል፡፡ በየዓመቱና አስፈላጊ ሆኖ በሚገኝበት ጊዜም በሕጋዊ ኦዲተር እንዲመረመር ያደርጋል፡፡

8.የየአህጉረ ስብከቱን የባንክ ሒሳብ ለሚያንቀሳቅሱ ተወካዮች የውክልና ደብዳቤ ለሚመለከተው ባንክ ይጽፋል፡፡

9.በሀገር ውስጥና በውጭ ሀገር የሚገኙ አህጉረ ስብከትና አብያተ ክርስቲያናት የሥራ ሂደታቸውን ይከታተላል፤ ይቆጣጠራል፡፡

10.የየዓመቱን የሥራ ፍሬና የወደፊቱን ዕቅድ የሚያስረዳ ሪፖርት በየዓመቱ በጥቅምት ወር ለሚደረገው አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ያቀርባል፤ አጠቃላይ ጉባኤው የመከረበትና ያሳለፈው የውሳኔ ሐሳብ ለቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ቀርቦ ሲጸድቅ በሥራ ላይ እንዲውል ያደርጋል፡፡

11.የየመመሪያዎቹ፣ ድርጅቶችና የልዩ ልዩ የሥራ ዘርፎች የሥራ ኀላፊዎችን የሥራ ዝውውር እድገት በተመለከተ በአጠቃላይ ቤተ ክህነት ሥራ አስኪያጅ አቅራቢነት ተጠንቶና ቅዱስ ፓትርያርኩ ሲስማሙበት በሥራ ላይ እንዲውል ያደርጋል፡፡

12.አስፈላጊ በሆኑ ጉዳዮች ላይ ቅዱስ ፓትርያርኩን እያማከረ ይፈጽማል፤ ያስፈጽማል፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 53:Power and Function of the General Manager of the Head Diocese
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፶፫:የጠቅላይ ሥራ አስኪያጁ ሥልጣንና ተግባር
articles.contentEn:
In addition to the provisions under Article 42 Number 7 and Article 44 of the church law,the general manager shall have the following powers and functions:

1. The general manager shall be accountable to the Holy Synod and to his holiness the patriarch; shall be responsible for management of finance and property of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church, and he is chief administrator of diocese

2. The general manager shall preside over the patriarchate general Spiritual council as a deputy chairperson, and the head diocese administrative council as a chairperson

3. Shall issue directives to departments and organizations of the head diocese towards the realization of the objectives and functions of Spiritual council and accomplishment of different tasks of work units; and shall follow up and monitor that each head fulfills the duty entrusted upon him

4. Shall ensure that cases submitted at the level of first instance and/or appeals are seen and decided by the patriarchate head diocese administrative council; if the case is beyond the mandate of this council, he shall submit to the permanent Synod or the Holy Synod

5. Shall supervise the due collection and submission of the payment contributions fromall local churches

6. Shall supervise that all expenses are made in the accordance with the budget allocated for the patriarch general Spiritual council, and that the financial and property management is as per Articles 25 to 27 of this bylaw

7. Shall, upon joint signatures with secretary general of the Holy Synod, authorize every finance and property of the church budget as per the provisions under Article 44 Number 10 of church law; and shall get the same inspected by a certified auditor annually or at a time needed

8. Shall issue an approval letter to bank for representatives who authorize the bank account of the diocese

9. Shall follow up and supervise the activities of diocese and churches both at local and overseas

10. Shall present annual performance and future plan reports at the general Spiritual council meeting held every October; shall implement the decisions of the Holy Synod

11. Shall, upon assessment and approval by the patriarch, ensure the implementation of the request made by the general manager of head diocese for transfer and promotion of heads of departments, organizations, and different sectors

12. Shall, upon consultation with the patriarch,implement all accordingly
articles.contentAm:
የጠቅላይ ሥራ አስኪያጁ በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ ፵፪ ንኡስ አንቀጽ ቁጥር ፯ አንቀጽ ፵፬ የተደነገገውና የሚከተሉት ሥልጣንና ተግባር ይኖሩታል”

፩. ጠቅላይ ሥራ አስኪያጁ ተጠሪነቱ ለቅዱስ ሲኖዶስና ለቅዱስ ፓትርያርክ ሆኖ ለመላው የኢትዮጲያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን የሥራ አመራር የገንዘብና ንብረት አስተዳደር የበላ ኃላፊ በጠቅላላው የቤተ ክህነት ዋና ባለስልጣን ነው፡፡

፪. ጠቅላይ ሥራ አስኪያጁ የመንበረ ፓትርያርክ አጠቃላ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤን በም/ሰብሳቢነት፡ የጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት አስተዳደር ጉባኤን በዋና ሰብሳቢነት ይመራል፡፡

፫. የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ የቆመለትን ዐላማና ተግባር ለመፈጸምና ልዩ ልዩ የክፍል ሥራዎችንም ለማሟላት ለጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት መምሪያዎችና ድርጅቶች የሥራ መመሪያ ይሰጣል፤ እያንዳንዱ የሥራ ዘርፍ ኃላፉም የተመደበለትን የሥራ ደርሻ በትክክል እያከናወነ መሆኑን ይከታተላል ይቆጣጠራል፡፡

፬.በመጀመሪያ ደረጃም ቤተ ክህነት አስተዳደር ጉባኤ እንዲጣዩና እንዲወሰኑ ያደርጋሉ፡፡ ከዚህ ጉባኤ ባሌ የሆነውን ጉዳይ ለቋሚ ሲኖዶስ ወይም ለቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ያቀርባል፡፡

፭.በየጊዜው ከየሰበካው ቤተ ክርስቲያን ለጠቅላላው አገልግሎት ጉዳይ ተብሎ የሚከፈለው ገንዘብ ተጠቃልሎ መሰብሰቡንና በትክክለኛው ቦታ በወቅቱ ገቢ መሆኑን ይከታተላል፡፡

፮.ማንኛውም ዓይነት ወጪ በሚደረግበት ጊዜ ለመንበረ ፓትርያርኩ አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ በተፈቀደው በጀት መሠረት መሆኑንና የሑሳቡ አያያዝና የንብረቱ አጠባበቅ በቃለ ዓዋዲ አንቀጽ 25፣ 26፣27 እና 56 በተዘረዘረው መሠረት መፈጸሙን ይቆጣጠራል፡፡

፯.በሕገ ቤተክርስቲያን አንቀጺ 44 ቁጥር 10 በተደነገገው መሠረት በበጀት የተመደበውን ማንኛውንም የቤተ ክርስቲያኑቱን ገንዘብና ንብረት ከቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ዋና ሐላፊ ጋር በማራ ፊርማ ያንቀሳቅሳል።በየአመቱና አስፈላጊ ሆኖ በሚነኝበት ጊዜም በሕጋዊ ኦዲተር አንዲመረመር ያደርጋል፡፡

፰.የየአህጉረ ስብከቱን የባንክ ሒሳብ ለሚያንቀሳቅሱ ተወካዮች የውክልና ደብዳቤ ለሚመለከተው ባንል ይጽፋል።

፱ .በሀገር ውስጥና ውጪ ሀገር የሚገኙ አህጉረ ስብከትና አብያተክርስቲያናት የሥራ ሂደታቸውን ይሀታተላል፣ይቆጣጠራል፡፡

፲.የየዓመቲን የሥራ ፍሬና የወደፊቱንም ዕቅድ የሚያስረዳ ሪፖርት በየዓመቱ በጥቅምት ወር ለሚደረገው አጠቃላይ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ያቀርባል፤ አጠቃላይ ጉባኤው የመረበትና ያሳለፈው የውሳኔ ሐሳብ ለቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ቅርቦ ሲጸድቅ በሥራ ላይ እንዲውል ያደርጋል፡፡

፲፩. የየመምሪያዎቹ፣ የደርጅቶችና የልዩ ልዩ የሥራ ዘርፎች የሥራ ኃላፊዎቸን የሥራ ዝውውር እድገት በተመለከተ በጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት ሥራ አስኪያጅ አቅራቢነት ተጠንቶና ቅዱስ ፓትርያርኩ ሲስማሙበት በሥራ ላይ እንዲውል ያደርጋል፡፡

፲፪. አስፈላጊ በሆኑ ጉዳዮች ላይ ቅዱስ ፓትርያርኩን እያማከረ ይፈጽማል፤ያስፈጽማል፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 54: Deputy General Manager of the Head Diocese
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፶፬: ስለ ጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት ም/ሥራ አስኪያጅ
articles.contentEn:
In addition to the provisions under Article 45 of the church law, the deputy manager shall have the following powers and functions:

1. The deputy manager

A. Shall carry out the activities identified with directives given to him by the general manager.

B. Shall act as the general manager in his absence.

2. The deputy manager shall be accountable to the general manager.
articles.contentAm:
ም/ሥራ አስኪያጅ በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ 45 የተደነገገው እና የሚከተሉት ሥልጣንና ተግባር ይኖሩታል፡፡ 

1. ም/ሥራ አስኪያጁ

አ) ከጠቅላይ ሥራ አስኪያጁ ተለይተው በመመሪያ የሚሰጡትን ተግባራት ያከናውናል፡፡

በ) ጠቅላይ ሥራ አስኪያጁ በማይኖርበት ጊዜ ይሠራል፡፡

2. ም/ሥራ አስኪያጁ ተጠሪነቱ ለጠቅላይ ሥራ አስኪያጁ ይሆናል፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 55: Management Procedure and Additional Meeting Time of Spiritual Councils
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፶፭ : የሰበካ መንፈሳውያን ጉባኤያት የአመራር ሥነ ሥርዓትና ተጨማሪ የስብሰባ ጊዜ
articles.contentEn:
1. Management Procedure of Spiritual Councils. The management procedure of Spiritual Councils at different levels shall be as follows:

A. Spiritual councils at any level shall commence work in the attendance of two-thirds of the members.

B. The issues set on the agenda shall be decided by the majority vote of the attending members; the chairman shall cast a winning vote during a tie.

C. Matters decided on in each session shall be recorded in minutes and signed by all attending members.

D. The chairperson of the council shall be responsible for the implementation of the decision made by the Spiritual council.

2. Additional Meeting Time. In addition to the regular meeting time as cited under Chapter 3, Article 7, Number 1 B & C; Chapter 5, Article 31, Number 1; and Chapter 6, Article 37, Number 2, Spiritual Councils at different levels shall call extraordinary meetings when they have an urgent case and adequate reasons or when such a meeting is called by more than half of the members.
articles.contentAm:
1. የሰበካ መንፈሳዊያን ጉባኤያት የአመራር ሥነ ሥርዓት፡ በየደረጃው የሚገኙትን የሰበካ መንፈሳውያን ጉባኤያት የአመራር ሥነ ሥርዓት ቀጥሎ እንደተመለከተው ይሆናል፡፡

ሀ/ በማናቸውም ደረጃ የሚገኝ የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ከአባሎቹ ሁለት ሦስተኛው ከተገኙ ጉባኤው እንደተሟላ ተቆጥሮ ሥራውን ሊቀጥል ይችላል፡፡

ለ/ ለጉባኤው የቀረቡት ጉዳዮች የሚወሰኑት በዕለቱ በተገኙት አባሎች ድምፅ ብልጫ ሲሆን፣ ድምፁ እኩል በእኩል በሚሆንበት ጊዜ ሰብሳቢው ያለበት ወገን ወሳኝ ድምፅ ይኖረዋል፡፡

ሐ/ በእያንዳንዱ ስብሰባ ላይ የተወሰነው ጉዳይ በቃለ ጉባኤው ተዘጋጅቶ በዕለቱ ስብሰባ ላይ የተገኙ አባላት ብቻ በሙሉ ይፈርሙበታል፡፡

መ/ የሰበካውን መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ውሳኔ የመፈጸምና የማስፈጸም ኀላፊነት የጉባኤው ሰብሳቢ ነው፡፡

2. ተጨማሪ የስብሰባ ጊዜ፡ በቃለ ዐዋዲ በምዕራፍ 3 በአንቀጽ 7 በተራ ቁጥር 1 በፊደል (ለ) እና (ሐ)፣ በምዕራፍ 5 አንቀጽ 31 ተራ ቁጥር 1፣ በምዕራፍ 6 አንቀጽ 37 ተራ ቁጥር 2 ከተገለጸው መደበኛ የስብሰባ ጊዜ በተጨማሪ፣ በየደረጃው የሚገኙትን ሰበካ መንፈሳውያን ጉባኤያት አስቸኳይ ጉዳይ ሲገጥማቸውና አስፈላጊ የሆነ ምክንያት ሲኖራቸው ወይም ከጉባኤው አባላት መካከል ከግማሽ በላይ የሆኑት ስብሰባ እንዲደረግ ሲጠይቁ፣ በየሰብሳቢዎቻቸው ጥሪ በማናቸውም ጊዜ ስብሰባ ሊያደርጉ ይችላሉ፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 56: Miscellaneous Revenues of the Spiritual Council
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፶፮ :ስለ ሰበካው ቤተ ክርስቲያን ልዩ ልዩ ገቢ
articles.contentEn:
1.As mentioned on the holy bible Leviticus 27:30-33; Deuteronomy 14:22-29; Numbers 18:20-28; Nehemiah 10:32-39; Malachi 3:7-13;Matthew 22:21acts 4:32-36; 1 Corinthians 16:1-7 every faithful must pay one-tenth of their incomes to the church for God’s work and for the use of different social and spiritual works.The types of church’s revenues from the Spiritual clergies and the faithful as well as from other sources are mentioned as follows:

1. Monthly and annual contribution;

a. The Bible writes that it is the obligation of every faithful to pay one-tenth of their incomes

b. A clergy or a faithful with their own incomes shall pay Birr 20 (twenty) monthly; but, depending on the situation in the locality, the archbishop of the diocese, through administrative council, shall determine the payment more than Birr 20 (twenty)

c. Anyone may make a contribution greater than the above mentioned amount upon consent.

d. But those, who cannot pay in cash, shall have Christian obligation to make contribution fromhis own harvest or prosperity

e. If anyone cannot make the contribution payment mentioned under this number, letters A-C, the matter shall be seen by the Spiritual administrative council (executive committee) and affordable rate shall be affixed thereof.And free service shall be rendered to those who cannot make any kind of payment or contribution.f. And those who are capable of serving the church with their labor and knowledge, can do accordingly.

2. Revenue from the Spiritual and other faithful:

a. Vow

b. Alms collection box

c. Gift

d. Monthly and annual contribution

e. Sale of handicrafts and artifacts

f. Incomes from contributions for holy water service and from church visitors

g. Incomes from spiritual and social services of Sunday School, Evangelical and other units of the church

h. Different developmental works

i. Any type of income not mentioned under the above mentioned titles (categories)

3. The cash and property mentioned under Numbers 1 and 2 shall be collected and deposited into the church treasury; and financial expenses shall be made on the basis of the annual budget allocation, upon written authorization only by the Spiritual chairperson4. In order to ensure effective monitoring, all revenues of cash and property shall be collected with a uniform official invoice issued under the supervision of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church patriarchate head office and the responsibility of archbishopric diocese office

5. Any Spiritual or individual working with another invoice in the name of the church, without the authorization and consent of the patriarchate head office in violation of this bylaw,shall be held accountable; and the invoices shall be seized and invalidated. The money collected upon the seized invoices shall be deposited to the church with official invoice.6. The money from each local church Spiritual council shall be deposited in a bank account by the name of the local church; and the money collected from the Woreda to patriarchate general Spiritual council shall be deposited in a bank account by the name of the Spiritual councils established at different levels;and the resource shall be mobilized as needed and upon decision as per the plan in the budget year
articles.contentAm:
በቅዱሳት መጻሕፍት (በኦሪት ዘሌ 27:30-33፤ በኦሪት ዘዳ 14:22-29፤ በኦሪት ዘኁ 18:20-28፤ ነህ 10:32-39፤ ትን.ሚል 3:7-13፤ ማቴ 22:21፡ የሐዋ ሥራ 4:32-36፡ 1ኛ ቆሮ 16:1-7 በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ (* ተራ ቁጥር %1 እንደተደነገገው ማንኛውንም ምዕመን ከሚያገኘው ከማናቸውም ሀብቱና ንብረቱ ለእግዚአብሔር ቤተ መቅደስ አገልግሎትና ለቤተ ክርስቲያን አገልጋዮች ካህናት በጠቅላላው ለመንፈሳዊና ማኅበራዊ አገልግሎቶች የሚውል ዐሥራት፣ በኩራት፣ ቀዳምያት መክፈል ክርስቲያናዊ ግዴታው ነው፡፡ከሰበካ ው ካህናትና ምእመናንም ሆነ ከሌሎች ልዩ ልዩ ቦታዎች የሚገኘው የቤተ ክርስቲያን የገቢ ዓይነት ቀጥሎ የተመለከተው ነው፡፡

1. የወርና የዓመት ክፍያ፣

ሀ/ ማንኛውም ክርስቲያን ከሚያገኘው ገቢ ላይ እስከ ዐሥራት (ከዐሥራ አንድ) መክፍል በቅዱስ መጽሐፍ የታዘዘ ግዴታ ነው፡፡

ለ/ ገቢ ያለው ካህንም ሆነ ምእመን ለሚገለገልበት አጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያና የሰበካ ጉባኤ የአባልነት ክፍያ በየወሩ ብር * (ሃያ) ይከፍላል፡:ሆኖም ግን የአካባቢው ሁኔታ መሠረት በማድረግ የሀገረ ስብከቱ ሊቀ ጳጳስ በአስተዳደር ጉባኤ እየወሰነ ከብር * (ሃያ) ብር በላይ ሊያስከፍል ይችላል፡፡

ሐ/ በጎ ፈቃድ ያለው ከላይ ከተጠቀሰው የበለጠ ክፍያ ሊያደርግ ይችላል፡፡

መ/ ጥሬ ገንዘብ መክፈል ያልቻለ በዓይነት ከምርቱና ከሀብቱ የመክፈል ክርስቲያናዊ ግዴታ አለበት፡፡

ሠ/ በዚሁ ተራ ቁጥር ከፊደል ሀ እስከ መ የተመለከተውን ክፍያ መክፈል የማይችል ቢኖር ሁኔታው በሰበካው መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ (ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) ተጠንቶ ሊከፍል በሚችለው መጠን ይወሰንለታል፡፡ ፈጽሞ ለመክፈል የማይችል ከሆነም በነጻ መንፈሳዊ አገልግሎት ይፈጸምለታል፡፡

ረ/ በጉልበትና በዕውቀት ሥራ መርዳት የሚችል ሆኖ ሲገኝ እንደችሎታው ለቤተ ክርስቲያን ተገቢውን አገልግሎት ማበርከት ይችላል፡፡

2. ከሰበካውና ከሌሎች ምእመናን የሚገኘው የገንዘብ ገቢ፣

ሀ/ ስእለት

ለ/ ሙዳየ ምጽዋት

ሐ/ ስጦታ /መባእ/

መ/ የወርና የዓመት በዓል ገቢ

ሠ/ የቅርጻ ቅርጽና የተግባረ እድ ሽያጭ

ረ/ በጠበል አገልግሎት በሙዳየ ምጽዋት የሚገኝ ገቢና ከቤተ ክርስቲያን ጎብኝዎች

ሰ/ ከሰንበት ት/ቤት፣ ከስብከተ ወንጌል እና ከልዩ ልዩ ክፍሎች መንፈሳዊና ማኅበራዊ አገልግሎቶች

ሸ/ ከልዩ ልዩ የልማት ሥራዎች

ቀ/ በዚህ የገቢ አርእስት ውስጥ ያልተጠቀሰ ማናቸውም ዓይነት ገቢና ሌላም ልዩ ልዩ የገቢ ምንጮችን በመፍጠር የሚገኝ ገንዘብና ንብረት ይሆናል፡፡

3. በዚህ አንቀጽ በተራ ቁጥር 1 እና 2 በዝርዝር የተገለጸውን ገንዘብና ንብረት ተጠቃልሎ በቤተ ክርስቲያኑ ገንዘብ ቤት የገንዘብ ወጪ የሚደረግ በተፈቀደው ዓመታዊ የገንዘብ ድልድል /በጀት/ መሠረት የሰበካው ሰብሳቢ በጽሑፍ ሲያዝ ብቻ ነው፡፡

4 ማናቸውም ዓይነት የሰበካው ገንዘብና ንብረት ገቢ ለቁጥጥር እንዲያመች በኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አስተዳደር ሊሞክሩበት በተፈቀደ መሠረት ተሠራሪ፡

articles.titleEn: Article 57: Miscellaneous Expenses of the Spiritual Church
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፶፯:ስለ ሰበካው ቤተ ክርስቲያን ልዩ ልዩ ወጪ
articles.contentEn:
The financial expenses of Spiritual council are mentioned as follows:The financial expenses of Spiritual council are mentioned as follows:

1. The local church shall pay the 20% of contribution from clergies and the faithful; vow; alms box; development projects and any other incomes. And the diocese shall implement the payment as per Article 42 Number 5 of this bylaw.

2. In accordance with the budget allocation approved by superior body:

A. Salaries

B. Petty cash

C. For different planned activities

3. The financial expenses shall be made from treasury of the church or Spiritual council at different levels on the basis of the annual budget allocation, upon written authorization only by the local Spiritual administraton(chairperson)

4. The fiscal year of every Spiritual council shall be from Hamle 1 to Sene 30.

5. The annual performance report, property management and handling, financial income and expense prepared in the budget year shall be submitted to the archbishopric diocese office by 30 Hamle. And the archbishopri diocese office, upon assessment and review,shall present annual report to the patriarchate head office by 30 Nehassie.

6. The Spiritual councils established at different levels shall not make expenses beyond their budget limit

7. Spiritual councils shall be cautious that their incomes vary from year to year, and to avoid shortage of financial resource needed for salaries, petty cash, for church maintenance and renovation activities, they shall retain 25% in bank account of the contributions collected in the fiscal year; and the same amount shall be mobilized upon assessment and also approval by the archbishop of the diocese.
articles.contentAm:
የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ የገንዘብ ወጪ ከዚህ ቀጥሎ እንደተመለከተው ይሆናል፡፡

1.አጥቢያው ቤተ ክርስቲያን ከካህናትና ምእመናን ክፍያ፣ ከስእለት፣ ከሙዳየ ምጽዋት፣ ከልማት ሥራዎችና ከማንኛውም ገቢ ላይ *% (ሃያ በመቶ) ለሀገረ ስብከቱ ይከፍላል፡፡ ሀገረ ስብከቱም በዚህ ቃለ ዐዋዲ አንቀጽ (2 ተራ ቁጥር 5 መሠረት ክፍያውን ይፈጽማል፡፡

2. ከበላይ አካል በተፈቀደ በጀት ድልድል መሠረት፡-

ሀ/ ለደመወዝ

ለ/ ለሥራ ማስኬጃ

 ሐ/ በዕቅድ ለተያዙ ልዩ ልዩ ሥራዎች ወጪ ያደርጋል፡፡

3. ከቤተ ክርስቲያኒቱ ወይም በየደረጃው ከሚገነው የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ገንዘብ ቤት የገንዘብ ወጪ የሚደረገው በተፈቀደው ዓመታዊ የገንዘብ ድልድል /በጀት/ መሠረት የአጥቢያ ሰበካው አስተዳዳሪ /ሰብሳቢ/ በጽሑፍ ሲያዝ ብቻ ነው፡፡

4. በማንኛውም  ደረጃ የሚገኘው የሰበካ አስተዳደር የበጀት ዓመት ሐምሌ 1 ቀን ተጀምሮ ሰኔ ' ቀን ይዘጋል፡፡

5. በበጀት ዓመቱ መጨረሻ በየደረጃው የተጠናቀረው የንብረት አያያዝና አጠባበቅ የገንዘብ ገቢና ወጪ ሒሳብና የሥራ ክንውን ሪፖርት እስከ ሐምሌ ' ቀን ድረስ መንበረ ጵጵስና ሀገረ ስብከት ጽ/ቤት መድረስ አለበት፡፡ ሀገረ ስብከት ጽ/ቤትም የበኩሉን አጥንቶና አጣርቶ ዓመታዊ ሪፖርት እስከ ነሐሴ ' ቀን ለመንበረ ፓትርያርክ ጠቅላይ ጽ/ቤት እንዲደርስ ያደርጋል፡፡

6. በየደረጃው የተቋቋሙት ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤያት ከተፈቀደላቸው በጀት ውጭ የገንዘብ ወጪ ማድረግ አይችሉም፡፡

7. እያንዳንዱ ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ገቢ  የአንዱ ዓመት ከፍ፣ የአንዱ ዓመት ገቢ ዝቅ ሊል ስለሚችል ለደመወዝ፣ ለሥራ ማስኬጃና ለቤተ ክርስቲያን ማደሻ ታጥቶ ችግር  እንዳይደርስ አስቀድሞ ጥንቃቄ በማድረግ ማንኛውንም የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ጽ/ቤት አዲስ የበጀት ድል ድል በሚያደርግበት ወቅት በበጀት ከሚደለደለው ሒሳብ ላይ ለመጠባበቂያ በበጀት ዓመቱ ከተሰበሰበው ገቢ ላይ *5% /ሃያ አምስት ከመቶ/ በባንክ ማስቀመጥ አለበት፡፡ ይህም ሒሳብ የሚንቀሳቀሰው ተጠንቶ ሲቀርብ በሀገረ ስብከቱ ሊቀ ጳጳስ ፈቃድ ይሆናል፡፡

1.በቤተ ክርስቲያን ስም የሚገኙት ንዋያተ ቅድሳትና ጥንታዊያን ቅርሶች አመዘጋገብ በቤተ ክርስቲያኒቱ  ቋንቋ የግእዝ ፊደልና አኃዝ እንዲሁም የተለመደው የመለያ ቁጥር (ኮድ) እየተሰጣቸው በቋሚ ባሕር መዝገብ ተመዝግበው በጥንቃቄ  ይቀመጣሉ፡፡

2.በገዳማት፣ አድባራትና ገጠር አብያተ ክርስቲያናት የሚገኙት ጥንታውያን ቅርሶች በተፈጥሮና በሰው ሠራሽ ችግር ምክንያት ጉዳት የሚደርስባቸው መሆኑ ሲታመንበትና ለጥንቃቄ ሲባል ከቦታ ወደ ቦታ ለማዛወር ቢያስፈልግ በሀገረ ስብከቱ ሊቀ ጳጳስ ሰብሳቢነት በሀገረ ስብከቱ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ ሲወሰን በጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት ጽ/ቤት ትእዛዝ እንዲንቀሳቀሱ ካልተደረጉ በስተቀር ካሉበት ታሪካዊ ቦታ በምንም ዓይነት መንቀሳቀስ የለባቸውም፡፡

3.የአንዱን ቤተ ክርስቲያን ቅርስ ወይመ ንብረት ካለበት ቦታ ወደ ሌላ ያዛወረ ወይም የሰወረ ወይም የሰረቀና ያሰረቀ ወይም የሸጠና የለወጠ ግለሰብ ወይም ድርጅት በፈጸመው ወንጀል ተጠያቂ ነው፡፤ አድራጎቱን የፈጸመው ሰው ካህን ከሆነ ከሥልጣነ ክህነቱ ከማንኛውም የቤተ ክርስቲያን አገልግሎትና ከጥቅሙ ሁሉ ታግዶ በሀገረ ስብከቱ ሊቀ ጳጳስ ወይም በሀገረ ስብከቱ ጽ/ቤት አማካይነት ለቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ ቀርቦ አስፈላጊው ቅጣት ይወሰንበታል፡፡

4.ለቅርሶች ደኅንነት ሲባል በበላይ አካል ታውቆና ተፈቅዶ ካልሆነ በቀር ቅርሶችን በካሜራ፣ በማይክሮ ፊልም እና በሌሎች ኤሌክትሮኒክስ መሣሪያዎችም ማንሣት የተከለከለ ነው፡፡

1.title: Criteria for Church Administrator
1.description: To be appointed as a church administrator, a clergy shall fulfill the following criteria:
criteria: A clergy above the age of 30

The one who can conduct Divine Mass and teach, and if possible, the one who has been taught the interpretations (commentaries) of the New Testament, Old Testament, and books of church sages, or one of these, or a graduate of a spiritual college with a diploma or above
The one who has rendered dedicated service to a local church
With good conduct and a model clergy
The one who has experience in administration
If possible, the one who speaks the language of the duty area (locality)

2.title: Criteria for Archpriest or General Manager of Woreda
2.description: To be appointed as an archpriest (general manager) of Woreda, a clergy shall fulfill the following criteria:
criteria: Must be a clergy above the age of 30
Must have at least a 5-year service as a church administrator or at a management level of a diocese
Literate over Qine (poem) and he who can perform Divine Mass and teach

If possible, the one who has been taught the interpretations (commentaries) of the New Testament, Old Testament, and books of church sages, or one of these; or a graduate of a spiritual college with a diploma or above
With good conduct and a model clergy
With experience in administration
If possible, the one who can speak the language spoken within the Woreda

3.title: Criteria for General Manager of Diocese
3.description: Without prejudice to the provisions mentioned in Article 53 Number 8 of church law, to be a general manager of a diocese, a clergy shall fulfill the following criteria:
criteria: Must be above the age of 35
The one who has served as a church administrator, or as an archpriest of Woreda, or at a management position of a diocese or head diocese
Literate over Qine (poem) and he who can perform Divine Mass and teach
The one who has graduated from one of the three interpretation (commentary) schools or a graduate of a spiritual college with a diploma or above
With good conduct and a model clergy
If possible, the one who can speak the language spoken within the diocese

4.title: Appointment of Monasteries, Churches, and Internal Servants
4.description: Those who shall be elected amongst clergies who are competent and free of arrogance, cunning, disobedience, intoxication, and other immoral activities, and those with a good reputation and positive moral values:
rules: Administrators of monasteries and churches, head monks (abbots), and nuns shall be appointed by the patriarch upon presentation by the diocese archbishop, but they shall be accountable to the diocese archbishop.
Other administrators of monasteries, churches, and rural churches shall be appointed by the diocese archbishop upon election by the congregation and approval by the office of the Woreda diocese.
A church administrator shall be appointed with the title of his church.

5.description: Without prejudice to the above-mentioned provisions, the title of the abbot or nun shall be approved by the diocese archbishop upon their presentation by their respective monasteries.

6.title: Church Titles
rules: Church titles such as Liq Tebebet (Head of sages), Qiese Gebez (Head priest), Kegn’geta, Gra’geta, Riese’Deber, Agafari, and Archdeacon shall be given by the administrator, upon approval by the superior body of the assessment and election by the council of clergies based on their competence and moral values.
Upon assessment and decision by the Spiritual Council on service period, competence, and conduct, the diocese archbishop shall appoint the clergies who are worthy of titles.

Amongst the faithful, those who are presented upon the decision by the local Spiritual Council for their dedicated church service, and upon confirmation by the diocese administrative council, shall be appointed by the archbishop.
No one shall give church titles to clergies and the faithful, except his holiness the patriarch and the diocese archbishop.

7.title: Hiring Process
rules: The Woreda diocese, based on the order given to it by the diocese, shall post notices for hiring teachers, preachers, priests, choir members, and other staff and hire them for the local church, only upon recognition by the diocese administrative council and approval by the diocese archbishop.

No employment shall be made for the churches under the Addis Ababa diocese by the local administrator or Spiritual Council, unless for those who are qualified after the exam as per the regulation enacted by the Holy Synod.

8.title: Employment and Assignment
8.description: The employment and assignment of workers from the level of the patriarchate office to Woreda diocese shall be assessed and dealt with as needed.

9.title: Volunteer Church Service
rules: Clergies who are working either on their own or being employed at private or public and other organizations shall, upon permission by a superior body, be assigned by the Spiritual Administrative Council to different units of the Spiritual and render free service as per their interests and competence.
The faithful shall have Christian rights and obligations to contribute and offer free services as needed to the church in every area, except sacramental services.

articles.titleEn: Article 60: Rights and Obligations of Clergies and Other Workers of the Spiritual Church
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፷:የሰበካው ቤተ ክርስቲያን አገልጋይ ካህናትና ልዩ ልዩ ሠራተኞች መብትና ግዴታ
articles.contentEn:
Without prejudice to the provisions mentioned in Article 12 of church law, church clergies and workers shall have the following rights and obligations:

1. Rights

a. Clergies and different workers serving within the Spiritual administration have legal rights to get salary as per their duty areas and professions

b. Those eligible monthly paid clergies and other church workers, who fulfill their pension contributions, shall have the rights to pension 

c. Every clergy or church worker shall have the right to get annual, sick, and maternity (for female servant) leaves as permitted by law

d. Every church workers shall have the right to promotion and salary increment on the basis of profession, performance quality,dedicated service and competence in his/her area of work 

e. Retirement age for all paid employees from local church to the patriarchate head office shall be 60 (sixty) years; however, given the importance of the person for the position, and upon recommendation by his/her immediate superior and examination by pension committee, as well as upon presentation to and consideration by the administrative council and approval by the diocese archbishop, he/she shall be employed on contractual basis

f. No contract employment shall have legal ground, except with the abovementioned provision

g. When those individuals, who are retired from public or governmental entities with their pension rights, want to serve positions from the local church to the patriarchate level, shall serve without salary but they shall not be paid; exception would be for positions that require special skills, and they shall be employed on contract basis.

h. If a worker serving the church from local church to the patriarchate level dies before or after retirement, his pension right shall be transferred to his legally accepted families.

i. The worker shall be entitled for retirement benefit only after serving 10 years on a permanent employment basis paying pensiocontribution; if the worker’s service year is less than 10 years the payment to be issued will be a severance payment of his monthly salary calculated in proportion to his service term.

j. When workers are transferred from one local church to another church or from one office to another office, the 4% of their salaries for pension contribution and the 6% from the employer shall be calculated and transferred to the place from where they will be retired, or to the organization to be established as a center by the employer office

k. Those teachers, who serve at traditional schools of different levels from local church to the patriarchate, by teaching interpretation (commentary) of scriptures, Qine (Geez poem), Yaredic hymns and performance,and liturgy at congregations (church schools), shall have work privilege that they will not be limited by retirement age, as long as they have the strength and capacity to work.

2. Obligation

a. Clergies and other hired workers must serve the church with their full potential.

b. All clergies and workers serving the church from local church to the patriarchate level shall pay 4% of their salary for pension contribution

c. Every clergy shall have the obligation to teach his spiritual children, and get them registered at the Spiritual council, and encourage and direct them to pay in due time the determined contribution to the church

d. Each priest is obliged to register his spiritual children in the church and encourage them to pay the determined contribution.

e. It is the obligation and responsibility of clergies to render services from baptism to funeral prayers to all faithful of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church.

f. Every clergy or worker shall have, as per the church law, the obligation to respect the order of church and get it respected; and to keep themselves away from immoral acts that may get the church criticized.

g. Every clergy and worker serving the church from local church to the patriarchate level shall have the obligation to serve the church, by being transferred as needed from one woreda diocese to another woreda diocese,and from one local church to another local church.

h. Every clergy and worker serving the church from local church to the patriarchate level shall have the obligation to discharge their obligation with due care and diligence; to be obedient to superiors and adhere to their directives on matters pertaining to their duties; to be of good conduct and display dedication; to respect the job and time of work.

i. A clergy shall not be idle, except for reason of sickness or other problems.A clergy must serve the church with all his God-given blessings;He shall have obligation, particularly to teach the youth to defend them from other beliefs.

 J. Church deacons shall serve the church with their deaconship titles at the ages between 10 and 20 years; those who are above 25 years of age may deliver services being under official marriage or fulfilling vows and remaining firm at monasteries
articles.contentAm:
በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ %2 የተደነገገው እንደተጠበቀ ሆኖ የቤተ ክርስቲያን አገልጋይ ካህናትና ሠራተኞች የሚከተሉት መብቶችና ግዴታዎች ይኖሯቸዋል፡፡1.መብት፡-

ሀ/ በሰበካው አስተዳደር ውስጥ የሚያገለግሉት ካህናትና ልዩ ልዩ ሠራተኞች እንደሥራቸውና እንደየሙያቸው በሚሰጡት አገልግሎት መጠን ደመወዝ ማግኘት ሕጋዊ መብታቸው ነው፡፡

ለ/ በወር ደመወዝ ሲከፈላቸው ቆይቶ የጡረታ ክፍያቸውም ላሟሉ አገልጋይ ካህናትና ልዩ ልዩ  የቤተ ክርስቲያን ሠራተኞች ከቤተ ክርስቲያኒቱ የጡረታ አበል የማግኘት መብት አላቸው፡፡

ሐ/ ማናቸውም የቤተ ክርስቲያን  አገልጋይ ካህናትና ሠራተኛ ሕግ በሚፈቅደው መሠረት የዓመት ፈቃድና የሕመም ፈቃድ ለሴት ሠራተኛም የወሊድ ፈቃድ የማግኘት መብት የተጠበቀ ነው፡፡

መ/ ማናቸውም የቤተ ክርስቲያን አገልጋይ ካህናትና ሠራተኛ በሙያ፣ በአገልግሎት፣ በሥራ ጥራት፣ በታማኝነትና በሚያበረክተው የሥራ ውጤት ብቁ ሆኖ ሲገኝ የደረጃና የደመወዝ እድገት የማግኘት መብት ይኖረዋል፡፡

ሠ/ ከአጥቢያው ቤተ ክርስቲያን እስከ መንበረ ፓትርያክ ጠቅላይ ጽ/ቤት ድረስ በደመወዝ ተቀጥሮ የሚያገለግል ሁሉ በዕድሜ ጸጋ ከሥራው በጡረታ የሚገለለው የዕድሜው ገደብ * ዓመት (ስድሳ ዓመት) ሲሞላው ነው፡፡ ነገር ግን ለሥራው ጠቃሚ ሆኖ ሲገኝ በቅርብ ኀላፊው አስተያየት በጡረታ ኮሚቴ ተጣርቶ ለአስተዳደር ጉባኤ ቀርቦ ሲታመትና በሀገረ ስብከቱ ሊቀ ጳጳስ ሲፈቀድ በኮንትራት ሊቀጠር ይችላል፡፡

ረ/ የኮንትራት ቅጥር ከዚህ በላይ ከተደነገገው ውጭ ሲፈጸም ሕጋዊነት አይኖረውም፡፡

ሰ/ በሕዝባዊም ሆነ በመንግሥታዊ ድርጅቶች ሲያገለግሉ ቆይተው የጡረታ መብታቸው የተጠበቀላቸው ግለሰቦች ከአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን እስከ መንበረ ፓትርያርክ ባሉት የሥራ መስኮች ለማገልገል በፈለጉ ጊዜ በነጻ ከሚሠሩ በስተቀር ደመወዝ አይከፈላቸውም፡፡ ሆኖም ልዩ ሙያ የሚያስፈልግ ሆኖ ከተገኘ በኮንትራት ተቀጥረው እንዲሠሩ ይደረጋል፡፡

ሸ/ ከአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን እስከ መንበረ ፓትርያርክ ድረስ ባሉት መሥሪያ ቤቶች ተቀጥሮ ሲሠሩ የዕድሜ እና የሀሰተ ጉባኤው በትምህርት አመታት የተለያዩ ሥራ ክፍያዎች ከአገልጋዮች የማግኘት መብት አላቸዋል፡፡

2.መጠን፡-

ሀ/ በሙሉ አመት ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሠራተኞች በሚወስዱት ደመወዝ የማግኘት ቅንብር ከተጀመረው በላይ አሠራር ማስተዳደር የተለያዩ ክፍያዎች በስም በተጀመረው ዕድረ መብታቸው ለሚከተለው ግለሰብን ማግኘት፡

articles.titleEn: Article 61: Rights and Obligations of the Faithful of the Spiritual Church
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፷፩:የሰበካው ቤተ ክርስቲያን ምእመናን መብትና ግዴታ
articles.contentEn:
Without prejudice to the provisions under Article 13 of church law, the faithful shall have the following rights and obligations:

1. Rights

a. A faithful, who is a resident within the Spiritual, duly recognized and registered as a membership, and given a valid ID card by the Spiritual council, shall have the right to get church services.

b. A faithful, who has paid his dues to and moved from his local church, shall not berequired to make payment upon his/her request to get church service from the other Spiritual church.

c. If a guest or traveler dies in another Spiritual he shall be served with funeral prayers free of payment upon certification by his ID or witnesses attesting that the deceased was a member and follower of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church

d. Every faithful shall be entitled to get funeral prayers for free of payment in the event of the death of his family members provided that the faithful is duly registered and given ID card by making the required monthly and annual payment.

e. A faithful, who has been duly registered and given ID card by the Spiritual, shall be entitled to get Free Church services by settling arrears in case payment is not made for two years and by paying penalties when the arrear exceeds two years.

f. When a faithful, who has not been registered by the local church Spiritual council, and who has not paid the necessary monthly contribution, passes away, provided that the deceased is a follower of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo, and upon confirmation by the spiritual father, the families of the deceased shall have the right to request service of church prayers with payment.

g. Every member of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church shall have the right to get service of church prayers and grave yard upon his/her passing away.

2. Obligations

a. It is the Christian obligation of the local Spiritual faithful to serve the church with financial contribution, administration, education, development and social services,generally providing assistance with their wealth, knowledge, and labor finance, skill and labor, also by participating in different activities of the church.

b. Every follower of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church living in one Spiritual area shall have the obligation to get registered at the local church; obtain membership ID card; make payments, as well as get family members registered; and help those who are independent to be registered on their own and have their respective ID cards;and to enable children to pursue religious lessons at Sunday school, and help them also maintain the order of church.

c. Every faithful must abstain from committing acts violating the moral values of the church and its rules and regulations; the follower is obliged to respect and uphold church rules and Holy Scriptures.

d. When a faithful moves from his residential Spiritual to another Spiritual, he/she shall return the Spiritual ID, receive a departure letter and present the same to the new Spiritual council for registration.

e. As a faithful is entitled to elect members of the Spiritual council, he shall also bear an obligation to be elected and serve the Spiritual.

f. Every faithful is obliged to have an ordained priest as a spiritual father.
articles.contentAm:
በሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አንቀጽ 13 የተደነገገው እንደተጠበቀ  ሆኖ ምእመናን የሚከተሉት መብቶችና ግዴታዎች ይኖሯቸዋል፡፡

1.መብት፡-

ሀ/ በሰበካው ውስጥ ነዋሪ የሆነ በአጥቢያው ሰበካ ጉባኤ በአባልነት ታውቆ የተመዘገበና ሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያንን ያሟላ፣ መታወቂያ የተሰጠው ምእመን ከቤተ ክርስቲያን ለምእመናን የሚገባውን፣ መንፈሳዊ አገልግሎት ማግኘት መብቱ ነው፡፡

ለ/ ከነበረበት  አጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን የሚገባውን የአባልነት ክፍያ የከፈለ ምእመን ወደ ሌላ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ቢዛወርና መንፈሳዊ አገልግሎት ማግኘት ቢፈልግ ተጨማሪ ክፍያ አይጠየቅም፡፡

ሐ/ እንግዳ ደራሽና ባይተዋር ቢሞት የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ አባልነቱ በመታወቂያ ካርድ ወይም ኦርቶዶክሳዊነቱን የሚገልጽ ማተብ በአንገቱ ቢገኝ ወይም የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን እምነት ተከታይ መሆኑ በምስክር ከተረጋገጠ የዕለት ጸሎተ ፍትሐት በነጻ ይደረግለታል፡፡

መ/ ማንኛውም ምእመን በሰበካ ጉባኤ ተመዝግቦ ወርኃዊና ዓመታዊ ክፍያ የከፈለ እና እሱ ካስመዘገባቸው ቤተሰቦች መካከል ከዚህ ዓለም በሞት ሲለዩ ያለ ምንም ክፍያ የዕለት ጸሎተ ፍትሐት ይፈጸምላቸዋል፡፡ ሥርዓተ ቀብራቸውም ይፈጸማል፡፡

ሠ/ በአጥቢያው ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ ጉባኤ ተመዝግቦና ተገቢውን ክፍያ ሲከፍል ቆይቶ በቂ ባልሆነ ምክንያት ክፍያውን ለሁለት ዓመት ያቋረጠ ምእመን ውዝፉን ብቻ በመክፈል፣ ሳይከፍል የቆየው ከሁለት ዓመት በላይ ከሆነ ከዋናው ክፍያ በተጨማሪ ተገቢውን መቀጫ ከፍሎ ማንኛውንም መንፈሳዊ አገልግሎት የማግኘት መብት አለው፡፡

ሰ/ በአጥቢያ  ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ ጉባኤ ያልተመዘገበና ተገቢውን ወርኃዊና  ዓመታዊ ክፍያ ያልከፈለ ምእመንም ከዚህ ዓለም በሞት ሲለይ የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አባል መሆኑ በንስሓ አባቱ ተረጋግጦ የአገልግሎት ዋጋ ከፍለው ጸሎተ ፍትሐት እንዲደርስለት የሟች ቤተሰቦች የመጠየቅ መብት አላቸው፡፡

ሸ/ ማንኛውም የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን አባል ከዚህ ዓለም በሞት በሚለይበት ጊዜ በአለበት አጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ጸሎተ ፍትሐት ከተደረገለት በኋለ የመቃብር ቦታ ማግኘት መብት ነው፡፡

2.ግዴታ፡-

ሀ/  የአጥቢያው ሰበካ ምእመናን በገንዘብ  ክፍያ በአስተዳደር፣ በትምህርት፣ በልማትና በማኅበራዊ ኑሮ አገልግሎት በጠቅላላውበሀብት፣ በዕውቀትና በጉልበት በመርዳት በሰበካው ልዩ ልዩ የክፍል ሥራዎች ውስጥ በመሳተፍ ቅድስት ቤተ ክርስቲያንን ማገልገል ክርስቲያናዊ ግዴታቸው ነው፡፡

ለ/ ማንኛውም በአንድ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ የሚኖርና የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን እምነት ተከታይ የሆነ ምእመን በአጥቢያው ቤተ ክርስቲያን መመዝገብ፣ በዚህ ደንብ የተወሰነውን ወርኃዊ እና ዓመታዊ ክፍያ መክፈል፣ የአባልነቱን መታወቂያ መያዝ እንዲሁም ቤተሰቡንና ልጆቹን በዝርዝር ማስመዝገብና አካለ መጠን ለደረሱትም በየራሳቸው የአባልነት መታወቂያ እንዲይዙ ማድረግ፣ በሰንበት ት/ቤት የሃይማኖት ትምህርት እንዲከታተሉና ሥርዓተ ቤተ ክርስቲያንን እንዲጠብቁ የማድረግ ግዴታ አለበት፡፡

ሐ/ ማንኛውም  ምእመን ሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያንን የሚተላለፍ፣ሥርዓተ ቤተ ክርስቲያንን ነቅፎ የሚያስነቅፍ፣ ክብረ ቤተ ክርስቲያንን ደፍሮ የሚያስደፍር መሆን የለበትም፣ በቤተ ክርስቲያን ሥርዓትና በቅዱሳት መጻሕፍት ትምህርት መመራትና በተወሰነለት የምእመንነት ደረጃ ጸንቶ መኖር ግዴታው ነው፡፡

መ/ አንድ ምእመን ከሚኖርበት የአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን በልዩ ልዩ ምክንያት ወደ ሌላ አጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሲዛወር ቀድሞ ከነበረበት ሰበካ ጉባኤ የተቀበለውን የአባልነት መታወቂያ ካስረከበ በኋላ  የመሸኛ ደብዳቤ መቀበልና ለተዛወረበት ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ በወቅቱ አቅርቦ መመዝገብ ይኖርበታል፡፡

ሠ/ አንድ ምእመን በሰበካው ቤተ ክርስቲያን  የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ አባላትን የመምረጥ መብት እንዳለው ሁሉ የመመረጥና የማገልገል ግዴታም አለበት፡፡

ረ/ እያንዳንዱ ምእመን ሥልጣነ ክህነት ካላቸው ቀሳውስት መካከል አንዱን መርጦ በንስሓ አባትነት መያዝ መንፈሳዊ ግዴታ ነው፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 62: Determining the Number of Serving Clergies
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፷፪:የአገልጋይ ካህናትና ብዛት ስለመወስን
articles.contentEn: The number of clergies and workers serving in monasteries, churches and rural churches shall be determined based on the services and income of the church, upon assessment at different levels by the Spiritual administrative council,the woreda diocese, and the archbishopric diocese, as per the directive of the Holy Synod.
articles.contentAm: በገዳማት፣ አድባራትና በገጠር አብያተ ክርስቲያናት በግንባር የሚያገለግሉት ካህናት እና ልዩ ልዩ ሠራተኞች ብዛት እንደ ቤተ ክርስቲያኑ  የአገልግሎት ስፋትና የገቢ መጠን በሰበካው መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ፣ በወረዳው ቤተ ክህነትና በሀገረ ስብከቱ ደረጃ በደረጃ እየተጠና ከቅዱስ ሲኖዶስ በሚሰጠው መመሪያ ይወሰናል፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 63: Decision Against Violation of This Ecclesiastical Constitution (Qale Awadee)and Church Law
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፷፫:ይህን ቃለ ዐዋዲና ሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያንን በሚተላለፍ ላይ የሚሰጥ ውሳኔ
articles.contentEn:
1. When any clergy or worker of the church is found in violation of the provision of article 60 number 2 of the Ecclesiastical Constitution, advice and consultation will be given at first offence; and warning at second offence;and penalty will be imposed at third.The penalty will be decided based on the gravity of the offence and it may include fine, canon penalty, transfer, and suspension, dismissal from work or cancelling membership.The maximum penalty of dismissal and membership cancellation shall be effective, only upon consensus by the Woreda diocese and approval by the archbishop of the archbishopric diocese.

2. The decision to dismissal or suspension of apriest from church service shall be applicable:

a. Only when the archbishop of the diocese,upon examination by administrative council,approves it if it is at local church and Woreda diocese level.

b. Only the general manager, upon review by the head diocese administrative council,approves it if it is the worker for position up from archbishopric dioces



3. If a priest is found guilty of misconduct that may cause withholding of priesthood, the archbishop shall withhold his priesthood, upon approval by the administrative council presided by the archbishop of the diocese.

4. Once a priest is summoned and warned as per section 1 of this Article, and if he then fails to get his spiritual child registered with the Spiritual council and make monthly and annual payment, and remains without fulfilling and getting other spiritual obligations fulfilled, but only to bring the same for funeral services upon death:

a. First, written warning

b. Secondly, fine from half of his one month salary

c. Thirdly, fine of a month salary with final warning

d. Finally, shall be suspended from his priestly title

5. When any follower is found in violation of the provision under Article 61 section 2 of the Ecclesiastical Constitution (Qale Awadee):

a. First, advice and education will be given by spiritual father or church representative 

b. Secondly, consultation and canon will be given

c. On the third time, temporary suspension from membership with warning

d. The decision on cancellation of membership of faithful shall be effective only upon examination by special council and approval by the diocese archbishop.
articles.contentAm:
1. ማንኛውም የቤተ ክርስቲያን አገልጋይ ካህን ወይም ሠራተኛ በቃለ ዐዋዲው በአንቀጽ *ተራ ቁጥር 2 የተደነገገውን ተላልፎ ቢገኝ እንደጥፋቱ ሁኔታ በመጀመሪያ ምክርና ተግሣጽ፣ በሁለተኛ ማስጠንቀቂያ ይሰጠዋል፤ በሦስተኛ ጊዜ ቅጣት ይወሰንበታል፤ ቅጣቱም እንደ ጥፋቱ ክብደት ተመዛዝኖ በገንዘብ ወይም በቀኖና፣ ከሥራ በማዛወር፣ ከሥራ በማገድ፣ ከሥራ በማሰናበት ወይም ከአባልነት በመለየት ሊወሰን ይችላል፡፡ ሆኖም የመጨረሻው ውሳኔ ማለት ከሥራ የማሰናበቱ ወይም ከአባልነት የመለየቱ ቅጣት ሊጸና የሚችለው የወረዳው ቤተ ክህነት ተስማምቶበት ወደ መንበረ ጵጵስናው ሀገረ ስብከት ቀርቦ በሊቀ ጳጳሱ ሲጸድቅ ይሆናል፡፡

2. አንድ ካህን ከሥራው እንዲታገድ ወይም እንዲሰናበት ከከህነቱ እንዲታገድ የሚሰጠው ውሳኔ ተግባራዊ ሊሆን የሚችለው

ሀ/በአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን በወረዳ ደረጃ ከሆነ የሀገረ ስብከቱ ሊቃ ጳጳስ በአስተዳደር ጉባኤ አይቶ ሲያጸድቀው፤

ለ/ ከሀገረ ስብከቱ ጀምሮ ባሉት የሥራ ዘርፎች የተመደበ ሠራተኛ ከሆነ ጠቅላይ ሥራ አስኪያጁ በጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት አስተደደር ጉባኤ አይቶ ሲያጸድቀው ብቻ ነው፡፡

3. አንደ ካህን ክህነትን በሚያስይዝ ጥፋት ላይ ቢገኝ በሀገረ ስብከቱ ሊቃ ጳጳስ ሰብሳቢነት በአስተዳደር ጉባኤ ተወስኖ በሊቀ ጳጳሱ ክህነቱ ሊያዝ ይችላል፡፡

4. በዚህ አንቀጽ ተራ ቁጥር 1 መሰረት ምክርና ተግሣጽ እንዲሁም ማስጠንቀቂያ ከተሰጠ በኋለ አንድ ካህን የንስሓ ልጁን በሰበካ ጉባኤ ሳያስመዘግብ ወርኃዊና ዓመታዊ ክፍያውን እንዲከፍል ሳያደርግ ሌሎችንም መንፈሳዊ ግዴታዎች ሳይፈጽምና ሳያስፈጽም ቆይቶ የንስሓ ልጁ ሲሞት ለፍትሐት ብቻ የሚያቀርብ ከሆነ፡-

ሀ/ ለመጀመሪያ የጽሑፍ ማስጠንቀቂያ

ለ/ ለሁለተኛ የአንድ ወር ግማሽ ደመወዙን

ሐ/ ለሦስተኛ ጊዜ ከመጨረሻ ማስጠንቀቂያ ጋር የአንድ ወር ሙሉ ደመወዙን ይቀጣል

መ/ በመጨረሻም ከሥልጣነ ክህነቱ ይታገዳል፡:

5. አንድ ምእመን መንፈሳዊ ግዴታውን መወጣት ካልቻለና በቃለ ዐዋዲው አንቀጽ *1 ተራ ቁጥር 2 የተደነገገውን ተላልፎ ቢገኝ

ሀ/ በመጀመሪያ ጊዜ በንስሓ አባቱ ወይም ከቤተ ክርስቲያኑ በተወከለ አባት አማካይነት ምክርና ትምህርት

ለ/ በሁለተኛ ጊዜ ተግሣጽና ቀኖና ይሰጠዋል

ሐ/ በሦስተኛ ጊዜ ከማስጠንቀቂያ ጋር ለተወሰነ ጊዜ ከአባልነቱ እንዲታገድ ይሆናል፡፡

6/ አንድ ምእመን ከአባልነት እንዲሠረዝ የሚተላለፈውን ውሳኔ ሊጸና የሚችለው የሀገረ ስብከቱ ሊቃ ጳጳስ በልዩ ጉባኤ አይቶ ሲያጸድቀው ብቻ ይሆናል፡፡

articles.titleEn: Article 64: Implementation Procedure
articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፷፬:የአፈጻጸም ሥነ ሥርዓት
articles.contentEn:
1. If there is an appeal against the decision of the local Spiritual administrative council (executive committee), it shall be filed to the Woreda diocese, according to the hierarchy.

2. Appeal against the decision of the Woreda diocese shall be reviewed and determined by the diocese administrative council in the presence of the diocese archbishop.

3. If members of the Spiritual from the local church to the Woreda level are found guilty of embezzlement or other offences, once they have started operation, the archbishopric diocese Spiritual administrative council presided by the diocese archbishop, upon review, shall have the power to conduct cancelation

4. If members of the archbishopric diocese Spiritual administrative council (executive committee)are found to have committed administrative defects, they shall be replaced upon the decision of the head diocese administrative council.

5. Spiritual councils at different levels shall have the obligation to accomplish financial and property management with invoices, models,and registries prepared at centralized system by the head diocese; those found working with other invoices shall be held legally accountable.

6. Those who directly or indirectly oppose this Ecclesiastical Constitution (Qale Awadee) by laws enacted to protect the Holy Church, to improve the livelihoods of its servants and clergies, and to fulfill the spiritual and social services provided to its children, the faithful,shall be cancelled from their titles, a clergy from his priestly tile and the faithful from membership.

7. The Qale Awadee of Miazia 19/1970 E.C.,and the amendment of Tahesas 10/1974E.C., along with the Spiritual council internal bylaws enacted on Ginbot 9/1977 E,C,, the Qale Awadee revised and enacted for third time on Ginbot 10, 1991 E,C and all other directives passed at various occasions have been amended by this Ecclesiastical Constitution (Qale Awadee)
articles.contentAm:
1.በአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ (ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) በተሰጠው ውሳኔ ቅሬታ ያለው ቢኖር ጉዳዩ  ደረጃውን ጠብቆ ለወረዳው ቤተ ክህነት በይግባኝ ሊቀርብ ይችላል፡

2.በወረዳው ቤተ ክህነት በተሰጠው ውሳኔ ቅሬታ ካስከተለ የሀገረ ስብከቱ ሊቀ ጳጳስ በተገኘበት በሀገረ ስብከቱ  አስተዳደር ጉባኤ ታይቶ ይወሰናል፡፡

3.ከአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ጀምሮ እስከ ወረዳ ያሉት የሰበካ ጉባኤ አባለት ተመርጠው ሥራ ከጀመሩ በኋላ ገንዘብ ቢያጠፉ ወይም ሌላ ችግር ቢፈጥሩ የመንበረ ጵጵስናው ሀገረ ስብከት አስተዳደር ጉባኤ በሊቀ ጳጳሱ ሰብሳቢነት ተመልክቶ የመሻር ስልጣን አለው፡፡

4.በመንበረ ጵጵስና ሀገረ ስብከት የተመረጡት የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ አስተዳደር ጉባኤ (ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮሚቴ) አባላት አሠራር በደል ወይም ጥፋት ፈጽመው ቢገኙ በጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት አስተዳደር ጉባኤ ታይቶ ሲወሰን በምትካቸው ሌሎች አባላት ይተካሉ፡፡

5.ከአጥቢያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ጀምሮ በየደረጃው የሚገኙት የሰበካ መንፈሳውያን ጉባኤያት የሒሳብ አያያዝና የንብረት አጠባበቅ በማእከላዊ አሠራር በጠቅላይ ቤተ ክህነት እየተዘጋጁ በሚወጡት ሞዴሎች ካርኒዎችና መዝገቦቹ የመሥራት ግዴታ አለባቸው፡፡ ከዚህ ውጭ በሌላ ሞዴልና ካርኒ ሲሠሩ የተገኙ  በሕግ ይጠየቃሉ፡፡

6.ቅድስት ቤተ ክርስቲያንን  ለመጠበቅ፣ የአገልጋዮቿን ካህናት ኑሮ ለማሻሻልና ለልጆቿ ምእመናን የሚሰጠውን መንፈሳዊና ማኅበራዊ አገልግሎት ለማሟላት የወጣውን ይህን የቃለ ዐዋዲ ደንብና ሕገ ቤተ ክርስቲያን በሥራ ላይ እንዳይውል በቀጥታም ሆነ በተዘዋዋሪ መንገድ የሚቃወሙ ካህናት ከከህነታቸው፣ ምእመናን ከአባልነታቸው ይሠረዛሉ፡፡

7.ከአሁን በፊት ሚያዝያ %9 ቀን %91+ ዓ.ም  የወጣው ቃለ ዐዋዲ፣ ታኅሣሥ % ቀን %91+4 ዓ.ም የወጣው የቃለ ዐዋዲ ማሻሻያ፣ ግንቦት 9 ቀን %91+7 ዓ.ም የወጣው የሰበካ መንፈሳዊ ጉባኤ ውስጠ ደንብና ግንቦት % ቀን %91-9 ለሦስተኛ ጊዜ ተሻሽሎ የወጣው ቃለ ዐዋዲ በየጊዜው የተላለፉት መመሪያዎች ሁሉ በዚህ ቃለ ዐዋዲ ተሻሽለዋል፡፡

articles.titleAm: አንቀጽ ፷፭:የተፈጻሚነት ወሰን
articles.contentEn: This Ecclesiastical Constitution (Qale Awadee)shall be implemented at the arch dioceses,woreda diocese, monasteries, churches, locals churches established and yet to be established across the world, based on the faith, order and tradition of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewhaedo Church, as well as by servants of the church at different levels, the faithful, and also by the spiritual, economic and social institutions established and yet to be established to speed up development and growth within the church.Originally written in Amharic, the Ecclesiastical Constitution has been translated, without distortion of the original content, into English at a centralized level so that it is implemented by overseas archdioceses in harmony with the law of the land.
articles.contentAm: ይህ ቃለ ዐዋዲ የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተ ክርስቲያን እምነት፣ ሥርዓት፣ ትውፊት መሠረት አድርገው በየትኛውም የዓለም ክፍል በተቋቋሙና በሚቋቋሙ አህጉረ  ስብከት፣ ወረዳ ቤተ ክህነት፣ ገዳማት፣ አድባራት፣ አጥቢያ አብያተ ክርስቲያናት፣ በየትኛውም ደረጃ ላይ በሚገኙት የቤተ ክርስቲያኗ  አገልጋዮችና ሠራተኞች፣ ምእመናንና ምእመናት እንዲሁም በቤተ ክርስቲያኗ ሥር ልማትና እድገት ለማፋጠን በተቋቋሙና በሚቋቋሙ መንፈሳዊ፣ ኢኮኖሚያዊ ማኅበራዊ ተቋማት ላይ ተፈጻሚነት ይኖረዋል፡፡ይህ ቃለ ዐዋዲ በማእከል ደረጃ በእንግሊዝኛ ቋንቋ ተተርጉመው በሥራ ላይ እንዲውል ይደረጋል፡፡ ከኢትዮጵያ ውጪ ያሉ አህጉረ ስብከት የቃለ ዐዋዲው ይዘት ሳይለቅ ከየሀገራቱ ሕግ ጋረ በማጣጣም በየሀገራቱ ቋንቋ እያስተረጎሙ በሥራ ላይ እንዲውል ያደርጋሉ፡፡
